[\[60b.1\]]ris sna tshogs dag_/bgrod nas bdud rtsi go 'phang thob/_/'di ltar ji bzhin thos nas ni/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyam 'gyur zhes/_/dge ba mang po rab tu bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan
[\[60b.2\]]yod kyi lho phyogs na bzhugs pa na bram ze sbas pa la shin tu khro ba'i rang bzhin can gyi bu zhig skyes par gyur to/_/ji tsam na pha'i srid srung gi rig byed kyi las kyi mtha' dag bor te rab tu byung ngo /_/de de na yang khro ba'i rang bzhin du gyur te/_bya dang ri dgas dag la gnod pa byed pa na/_nags tshal
[\[60b.3\]]la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis de de na gnas su mi ster te/_ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mngon par dang bar byed pa'i cho 'phrul chen po ston pa de'i tshe cho 'phrul chen po de la nags tshal la gnas pa'i lha de dag mngon par dang ste/_snying rjes smras pa/_'jig rten gyi
[\[60b.4\]]rgyan du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas byung gi/_khyod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir song shig ces ji srid du rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid pa'i bar du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dad par byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bkye ste/_ji tsam na rab tu byung ba'i bar du ste/_byams pa goms par byas nas dgra
[\[60b.5\]]bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/rab 'byor zhes ming grags par gyur pa'o/_/grang dang /_yul dang /_ljongs gang du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ba na bdag la su yang sems nyon mongs par ma gyur cig ces bya ba rnam par bltas te/_phyis spyod yul du 'gro bar byed de/_gang gi phyir sems nye
[\[60b.6\]]bar nyon mongs par byed na spyod yul du mi 'gro zhing zan gcod pa'i bar du yang byed do/_/ji tsam na des bsam pa na bdag nyid klu las shi 'phos pa dang /_gnyen rnams gdul byar gyur pa mthong ste/_ji tsam na klu'i khang par phyin te/_klu'i rigs lnga brgya 'ongs pa dag btul te/_de dag byams pa'i ting nge
[\[60b.7\]]'dzin la bkod de shing shal ma li'i nam mkha' lding gi gnod pa med par byas so/_/ji tsam na gnas brtan gyis nam mkha' lding rnams gdul ba'i phyir klu'i rigs lnga brgya shing shal ma li'i steng du bteg ste/_nam mkha' lding lnga brgya lnga brgya btul ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi nang du mchog ni dge slong rab 'byor 'di yin te/_las gang gis klur skyes she na/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu byung ste/_de'i mkhan
[\[61a.2\]]po nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas te/_des kyang nyon mongs pa med pa la dad pa thob po/_/des gzhon du rnams kyis rgod pa dang /_bzlog pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ni byams pa byams pa la gnas pa zhes smras pa dang /_de khros nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag ni sbrul dang 'dra'o zhes
[\[61a.3\]]bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par 'byung ngo /_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[61a.4\]]nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/btags pa'i ming dang gzugs btags pa las so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag bshad do/_/mngon shes rnam drug ces bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag mngon
[\[61a.5\]]par shes pa ni drug ste/_drug gang zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa dang /_lha'i mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sems kyi rnam grangs dang /_sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa dang /_zag pa zad pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/'o na rab tu byed pa las zhes bya ba la/_rab tu byed pa'i rkang pa'i
[\[61a.6\]]yang dag par sdud pa'i rab tu byed pa las/_mngon par shes pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/_shes rab dge ba ni mngon par shes pa zhes brjod de/_chos thams cad kyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so/_/gsum ni rig pa zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod
[\[61a.7\]]pa na'o/_/mi slob pa'i rig pa ni gsum ste/_mi slob pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i rig pa dang /_mi slob pa'i 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i rig pa dang /_mi slob pa'i zag pa zad pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i rig pa'o/_/sngon gyi
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]gnas rnams rig pa yis/_/mtho ris ngan song gzigs nas ni/_/de nas mngon shes nges pa yis/_/thub pa skye ba zad par 'gyur/_/kun las 'dod chags rnam grol zhing /_/sems ni 'dod chags grol zhes 'gyur/_/rig pa gsum po phun tshogs pas/_/de phyir gsum rig ces
[\[61b.2\]]bya'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum ni/_mdo drug gi tshogs kyi bzhi pa reg pa'i mdo las 'byung ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_ji ltar 'dod par nye bar gnas par bya ste/_ga ya mgo gang na ba der ljongs rgyu
[\[61b.3\]]zhing gshegs te/_rim gyis ga ya mgor gshegs te/_ga ya mgo'i a shir sha'i mchod rten na dge slong stong tham pa dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong rnams la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum po rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul
[\[61b.4\]]dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis gdams par mdzad de/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag pa na rang gi gdan las mi snang ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_shar phyogs su 'phos
[\[61b.5\]]te spyod lam bzhi ston par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_gshegs pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_gzims pa dang /_ston par mdzad do/_/me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs shing me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las rnam pa du ma'i 'od dag
[\[61b.6\]]'phros te/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul dag ston cing /_lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'byung zhing lus kyi smad nas 'bar ba dang /_lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun
[\[61b.7\]]'byung zhing lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed de/_shar phyogs ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /_de bzhin du nub dang /_de bzhin du byang phyogs su yang ston par byed de/_phyogs bzhir steng dang 'og tu rdzu 'phrul bstan par mdzad nas/_de nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ni de dag slar btul
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/_dge slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu/_yid ni 'di
[\[62a.2\]]lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu ste/_'di lta bur rtog par byed do/_/'di lta bur rtog par mi byed do/_/'di ltar yid la byed do/_/'di ltar yid la mi byed do/_/'di ni spangs pa'o/_/'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba ste/_'di ni bcom ldan
[\[62a.3\]]'das kyis kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/_dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun du 'bar ba'o/_/dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni 'bar ba gang zhe na/_dge slong dag mig ni kun du 'bar ba'o_/_gzugs dang /_
[\[62a.4\]]mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de yang kun du 'bar ba'o/_/gang gis kun du 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me 'bar ba
[\[62a.5\]]dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi 'pho ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun du 'bar ba'o zhes nga smra'o/_/dge
[\[62a.6\]]slong dag rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni kun du 'bar ba ste/_chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis 'byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug
[\[62a.7\]]bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de yang kun du 'bar ba ste/_gang gis kun du 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me 'bar ba dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi me kun du 'bar ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun du 'bar ba'o zhes nga smra ste/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam
[\[62b.2\]]par grol lo zhes gsungs so//_//bstan pa mchog_/mi 'khrul phyir dang phan pa dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das nA len dra a mras kun du bskor ba'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas khyim bdag nya pa'i bu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye
[\[62b.3\]]bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag nya pa'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa nA len dra 'byor ba rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'di na
[\[62b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa mang du mchis lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 'ga' zhig mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul dag bstan du bcug na legs te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dag gis mthong nas 'di lta bu'i nA len dra
[\[62b.5\]]phal cher bcom ldan 'das la dad par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gi bu nga 'di ltar dge slong dag khyed cag bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ong ba rnams la mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul dag ston cig ces nyan thos rnams la chos mi ston gyi/_'on kyang 'di ltar dge slong dag dge ba ni
[\[62b.6\]]gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes nyan thos rnams la chos ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla mar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul la nyes dmigs ci zhig yang dag par rjes su gzigs na 'di ltar dge slong dag dge ba ni gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes nyan
[\[62b.7\]]thos rnams la chos ston to/_/khyim bdag gi bu cho 'phrul ni rnam pa gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo/_/khyim bdag gi bu rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/_khyim bdag gi bu 'di na dge
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/_'di lta ste/_gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /_mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /_snang ba dang mi snang bar shes pa dang mthong ba nyams su myong bar byed pa dang /_
[\[63a.2\]]rtsig pa dang /_ra ba dang /_rdo ba dang /_ri la lus kyis thogs pa med par 'gro ste/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/sa la yang byi'u zul du byed de/_'di lta ste/_chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/_'di lta ste/_sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha'
[\[63a.3\]]la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba 'di dag lag pas nom zhing nyug pa dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur bar byed de/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze dag rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma nyi ma dang zla ba
[\[63a.4\]]lag pas nom zhing nyug pa'i bar du byed pa dag dad pa'i khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi bu 'ga' zhig gis mthong ste/_mthong nas ma dad pa'i khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi bu dag la 'di skad du/_kye skyes bu shes par gyis shig_/'di na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma gcig
[\[63a.5\]]tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba lag pas nom zhing nyug pa'i bar du byed pa dag ngas mthong ngo zhes smra'o/_/de 'di skad du/_kye skyes bu khyod kyis 'di na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyi ma dang zla ba la nom zhing nyug pa'i bar du byed pa mthong ba de la ngo mtshar ba ci zhig
[\[63a.6\]]yod/_kye skyes bu gan d+ha ra ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags yod do/_/de 'ga' zhig gis bzung zhing bcangs na rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyi ma dang zla ba la nom zhing nyug pa'i bar du byed pa yod do zhes smra na/_khyim bdag gi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gnas dang po 'di la dad pa'i khyim bdag gam
[\[63a.7\]]khyim bdag gi bu dag ma dad pa'i khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi bu'i nye bar brjod pa nyan snyam sems sam/_btsun pa de bzhin no/_/khyim bdag gi bu mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul la nyes dmigs 'di lta bu ngas yang dag par rjes su gzigs nas 'di ltar nyan thos
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]rnams la/_dge slong dag dge ba ni gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes chos ston par mdzad do/_/khyim bdag gi bu kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/_khyim bdag gi bu 'di na dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig ni rgyu mtshan nam/_yongs su brjod pa la kun brjod par bya ste/_yid
[\[63b.2\]]ni 'di lta bu'o/_/yid ni gzhan du'o/_/snga bar byas pa dang /_snga bar brjod pa yang kun brjod la/_gsang bar byas pa dang /_gsang bar brjod pa kun yang rjod par byed la/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba kun yang rjod par byed cing /_thag ring po yang
[\[63b.3\]]kun brjod la/_thag nye bar yang kun brjod cing /_sems kyang kun brjod la sems las byung ba yang kun rjod par byed de/_gang cung zad brjod pa de thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du yang ma yin pa dang /_rgyu mtshan nam yongs su brjod pa las kun rjod par mi byed mod kyi/_
[\[63b.4\]]'on kyang lha dang mi rnams las thos nas yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun rjod par byed de zhes bya ba nas/_thams cad de bzhin du gyur pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du dang /_rgyu mtshan dang yongs su brjod pa las kun rjod par yang mi byed la lha dang mi rnams las thos nas kun rjod par yang mi byed
[\[63b.5\]]mod kyi/_'on kyang yongs su rtog pa dang /_yongs su dpyod pas sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi yid yid kyis rnam par shes nas yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dge
[\[63b.6\]]sbyong ngam bram ze rgyu mtshan nam/_yongs su brjod pa las yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun rjod par byed pa zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_dad pa'i khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi bu dag gis mthong ste/_mthong
[\[63b.7\]]nas ma dad pa'i khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi bu de dag la 'di skad du kye skyes bu dag shes par gyis shig_/'di na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze rgyu mtshan nam yongs su brjod pa las yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun brjod ces bya ba nas/_thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du yang ma
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]yin pa ngas mthong ngo zhes smras pa dang /_kye skyes bu khyod kyis dge sbyong ngam bram ze rgyu mtshan nam yongs su brjod pa las yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun brjod ces bya ba nas/_thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du ma yin pa mthong ba la ngo mtshar ba ci zhig yod/_kye
[\[64a.2\]]skyes bu rtog byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags yod de gang zhig gis bzung zhing bcangs nas rgyu mtshan nam yongs su brjod pa las yid ni 'di lta bu'o zhes kun rjod par byed ces bya ba nas thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes smra na/_khyim bdag gi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gnas
[\[64a.3\]]gnyis pa 'di la dad pa'i khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi bu de dag ma dad pa'i khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi bu de dag gi nye bar brjod pa nyan snyam sems sam/_btsun pa de bzhin no/_/khyim bdag gi bu mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul la nyes dmigs
[\[64a.4\]]'di lta bu ngas yang dag par rjes su gzigs nas/_dge slong dag dge ba ni gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes nyan thos rnams la chos ston par mdzad do/_/khyim bdag gi bu rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/_khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[64a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba nas rgyas par gnas rnam pa gsum rnams la ston pa'i yongs su dag pa btsal bar bya'o zhes de'i dpe tshul khrims kyi phung po'i bsam gtan dang /_mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po'i mdo lnga pa'i stod kyi cha
[\[64a.6\]]las 'byung la/_smad kyi cha ni mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par tshangs pa'i bar du g.yo sgyu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba der bris zin to/_/ston pa la/_yid mgyogs 'gro ba zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das shar sha pa'i grong khyer gyi tsan dan gyi khang pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na
[\[64a.7\]]klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_gau ta ma zhes bya ba gnyis gnas te/_bcom ldan 'das shar sha pa'i grong khyer na chos ston gyis nyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o zhes gnas te/_de nas klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang /_chu bo lnga brgya nas byung ste shar sha pa'i grong khyer du 'ong ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]kyi chos rnams la mi brjed pa'i dran pas klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_gau ta ma gnyis shar sha ba'i grong khyer du 'ongs na grong khyer gzhig cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba gzigs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bos te/_maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin
[\[64b.2\]]gshegs pa'i glo bur ba'i bsod snyoms dag zung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_maud gal gyi bu chen po glo bur gyi bsod snyoms ni rnam pa lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_glo bur du lhags pa dang /_mgron po dang /_nad pa dang /_nad g.yog dang /_las byed pa rnams kyi'o/_/don
[\[64b.3\]]'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid las byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /_maud gal gyi bu thabs cig tu klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_gau ta ma gnyis gang na ba der gshegs shing nye bar gshegs te bka' stsal pa/_klu'i dbang po dag shur pa ri'i grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyur
[\[64b.4\]]ba de ltar bsam par gyis shig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_btsun pa dad pa'i shugs de 'dra bas bdag cag der 'ongs na gang yang bdag srog chags grog sbur yan chad la yang gnod par mi nus na/_shur sha pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de nas bcom
[\[64b.5\]]ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar rtsom pa na/_klu de dag so so nas 'di snyam du kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chu gsol bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te gcig gi chu 'thungs na gzhan dag mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis thabs kyi
[\[64b.6\]]rnam pa zhig bya'o zhes dgongs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bos te/_maud gal gyi bu chu lnga brgya gang du 'dus pa de las chu lhung bzed gang khyer la shog shig_/btsun pa de bzhin no zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las
[\[64b.7\]]mnyan te/_chu bo lnga brgya gang du 'dus pa de las chu lhung bzed gang blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la chu lhung bzed bkang nas phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis blangs te gsol to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag pha dang /_ma dag ni bu la dka' ba byed pa ste/_gsos skyed par byed cing 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston pa ste/_phrag pa gcig la pha/_phrag pa gnyis pa la ma khyer te/_lo 'khor ba
[\[65a.2\]]brgyar gnas pa dang /_gang yang sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUR+Ya dang /_dung dang /_shel dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram dang /_asma gar+b+ha dang /_mu sa la gar+b+ha dang /_lo he ta rA ga dang /_dung g.yas su 'khyil pa la sogs
[\[65a.3\]]pa 'di lta bu rnams kyis phyug par byas kyang bus pha dang ma la phan pa byas pa ma yin no/_/gang gis pha dang ma ma dad pa dad pa phun sum tshogs par byed cing 'dul ba dang /_rab tu 'god pa dang /_rab tu 'jog par byed cing tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims phun sum
[\[65a.4\]]tshogs pa dang /_ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_shes rab 'chal ba shes rab phun sum tshogs par byed cing 'dul ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /_rab tu 'jog par byed na/_'di tsam gyis bus pha dang ma la phan pa byas pa
[\[65a.5\]]yin no zhes gsungs so/_/bdag gis ma la phan pa cung zad kyang ma byas kyis da bdag gis ma gang du skyes pa bsam par bya'o zhes des bsams pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong zhing /_gang gis 'dul zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar
[\[65a.6\]]mthong nas/_de 'di snyam du bdag thag ring po nas 'ongs par gyur la bdag gis don 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs par bya'o zhes/_des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pha dang ma bu la dka' ba byed pa ste zhes
[\[65a.7\]]gsungs na/_bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bar 'os te/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste de gdul bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu gang gi rdzu 'phrul
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]gyis 'gro bar bya/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi steng du zhabs 'jog cing gshegs te/_zhag bdun gyis 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin to/_/maud gal gyi bu chen po thag ring po nas 'ong ba bu mo
[\[65b.2\]]bzang mos mthong ste/_mthong nas rings par de'i drung du 'ongs te smras pa/_yun ring mo zhig na bu mthong ngo yun ring mo zhig na bu mthong ngo zhes smras so/_/de na skye bo mang po'i tshogs dag 'di skad du gzhon nu ma 'di rab tu byung ba rgan po 'di'i mar ji ltar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /_de dag la
[\[65b.3\]]'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bdag gi phung po 'di gsos shing bskyed pa des na 'di ma zhes bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu ma bzang mo'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen par mdzad nas/_'phags pa'i bden pa
[\[65b.4\]]bzhi mthong ba de lta bu'i chos bstan par mdzad de/_gzhon nu ma bzang mos thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mtho ba nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de bden pa mthong nas ched du brjod pa lan gsum du ched du brjod pa
[\[65b.5\]]snga ma bzhin du lha dang mi la bkod do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/yang smras pa/_shin tu rkyen mang ldan pa'i ngan song lam/_/'jigs su rung las khyed kyi mthu yis bsgral/_/mtho ris 'gro ba'i bsod nams sgo phye zhing /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i lam ni bdag gis thob/_/khyod la
[\[65b.6\]]brten nas bdag skyon rnam dag cing /_/bdag gi mig ni shin tu rnam dag gyur/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin gyur cing /_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i gnas thob po/_/skye rga 'chi ba'i 'khrug dang bral gyur cing /_/lha dang lha min mi yi 'gro bas mchod/_/skye
[\[65b.7\]]ba stong du mthong ba rnyed dka' ba/_/thub pa mthong ba 'bras bu bcas par gyur/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par 'phags so/_/mngon par 'phags so/_/ded nas bzung ste bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngo zhing skyabs su 'gro zhing mngon par dang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig tu bsod snyoms bzhes par gnang bar mdzod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/_
[\[66a.2\]]gzhon nu ma bzang mos bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis rang gi lag nas [(]'drim [,]'brim [)]par byed/_stobs par byed de/_lan du mar bsod pa'o/_/bza' ba dang bca' ba
[\[66a.3\]]dag gis brims shing bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gsol bar rig nas lag pa gnyis kyis lhung bzed gyu ste/_stan dma' ba cig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan te/_tshe dang ldan pa
[\[66a.4\]]maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed blangs nas bkrus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu 'gro bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig_/gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi'o/_/gang yang rgyal
[\[66a.5\]]byed kyi tshal du phyin pa de lta bu'i dgongs pa mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das phyin tam/_maud gal gyi bu phyin to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags/_maud gal gyi bu yid mgyogs pa'o/_/
[\[66a.6\]]btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di ltar zab pa bdag gis rnam par mi shes te/_gal te rnam par shes par ma gyur na yang bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma tsam du gyur kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bzlog par mi bya'o/_/da bdag gis ci bya ste bud shing
[\[66a.7\]]tshig pa bzhin du gyur to zhes gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba la/_bzhi las 'phros pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa 'di nyid du sems can gyi gnas dgu'i skabs su bris shing /_mdzod kyi gnas gsum par
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]srid pa bar ma bsam par sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes yang dag par bshad do/_/ston min sprul pa po dang bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_phran tshegs kyi sde snod las don gyi sde tshan bcu pa las mdo 'di ltar 'don te/_de nas mnyan yod na gnas
[\[66b.2\]]pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag 'di snyam du rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis rab tu byung ba rnams dang rab tu byung ba rnams su rtsod cing 'thab pa dang mtshang 'bru ba dang chad pas gcod pa dag byung bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das la gus pas 'dri ba'i nus pa med do snyam mo/_/de nas bcom
[\[66b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gi sems thugs kyis mngon par mkhyen nas/_mgo bregs shing chos gos bgos pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sprul pa zhig sprul par mdzad
[\[66b.4\]]do/_/chos nyid kyis nyan thos rnams kyis sprul pa sprul nas/_nyan thos rnams smra na sprul pa yang smra bar byed la/_nyan thos rnams mi smra na sprul pa yang mi smra bar 'gyur zhing /_sprul pa gcig smra na/_thams cad smra zhing /_gcig mi smra na thams cad kyang mi smra bar
[\[66b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sprul pa sprul par mdzad pa na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri bar mdzad pa na sprul pa lung ston par byed la/_sprul pa dri bar mdzad na bcom ldan 'das lung ston par mdzad do/_/de nas sprul pa de stan las
[\[66b.6\]]langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar zhing phyag byas nas/_de'i tshe don gyi sde tshan 'di las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_phrag dog lhan cig mya ngan smre sngags 'don/_/'thab rtsod 'di dag gang gis
[\[66b.7\]]rab tu bskyed/_/phra ma dang bcas nga rgyal lhag nga rgyal/_/'di dag gang gis bskyed pa bdag 'dri'o/_/phrag dog lhan cig mya ngan smre sngags 'don/_/'thab dang rtsod pa 'di dag dga' bas bskyed/_/phra ma dang bcas nga rgyal lhag nga rgyal/_/'di dag dga' bas rab tu
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bskyed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa byung ngo /_/gcig cig smra bar gyur pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dpe ni lung ring po'i mdo las tshangs pa'i sprul pa de dag lha'i dbang po'i phang par 'dug ste so so nas gtam smras so zhes bya ba la
[\[67a.2\]]sogs pa 'byung ngo //_//'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa gtad de/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gsung rab bsdu ba byas so/_/dgra bcom pa lnga brgya
[\[67a.3\]]po de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_'phags pa 'od srungs chen po la bstan pa yongs su gtad do/_/de ltar bya ba ma lus par byas te/_ri bya rkang mo'i steng du 'dzegs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i na bzas lus dang bsil byed dang lhung bzed gtums
[\[67a.4\]]te/_ri gsum gyis bsgribs te/_bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i gsung rab kyi bar du nyams par ma gyur cing des rang gi 'khor rnams la rig par byed par 'gyur ro zhes byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byams pa 'jig rten du
[\[67a.5\]]byung ba de'i tshe nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang lhan cig sa phyogs der gshegs te ri gsum po dag rnam par bsal te/_bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i phyag gis rus pa'i tshogs bsnams te chos ston par 'gyur te/_chos ston pa thos nas nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dgra bcom
[\[67a.6\]]pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes phren tshegs las/_dbyangs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sman gyi gzhi'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa las rgyas par 'don to/_/chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba las mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa
[\[67a.7\]]phal cher mdo dang sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//'di ltar mdo las lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang zhes bya ba la/_lam gyi tshogs kyi bslab pa'i sgo'i mdo gsum pa dang bzhi pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa 'di nyid du/_de'i tshe de mi slob dgra bcom/_/zhes bya ba la/_
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]tshig le'ur byas pa dang /_yang tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin zhes bris zin to/_/sems yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba la/_stag gi byang chub kyi bu dang /_nyan thos kyi rnam par bshad pa sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig pa'i
[\[67b.2\]]tha ma las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas drug par bshad zin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan mi dge ba dag kyang zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la/_tshangs pa'i tshogs kyi sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i maud gal gyi bu dang sbas pa'i mdo las 'di ltar 'don te/_
[\[67b.3\]]de'i tshe na sde dpon nye dga' 'khor der 'dus par gyur cing tshogs te 'dug par gyur te/_de nas sde dpon nye dgas chen por grags pa'i bram ze 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'char byed khyed cag 'ong ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na de ltar bsam gtan dang bsam
[\[67b.4\]]gtan gyi tshul gyis mngon par dga' ba bden nam/_sde dpon de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi tshul gyis sdom par byed do/_/dus gcig gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma chu bo can byi kun dze ka'i spyil bu na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan
[\[67b.5\]]'das gau ta ma des bdag la bsam gtan thams cad ni bsngags shing bsam gtan thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags pa gsung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chen por grags pa'i bram ze 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'char byed khyod 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das
[\[67b.6\]]gau ta ma des bdag la bsam gtan thams cad bsngags shing bsam gtan thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa gsung ngo zhes ma smra shig_/'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ni bsngags par mi 'os pa de dag gi bsngags pa mi gsung gi/_bsngags par 'os pa dag gi bsngags pa mi
[\[67b.7\]]gsung ngo /_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma gang bsngags par mi 'os pa dag gi bsngags pa mi gsung zhe na/_'char byed 'di na kha cig 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems la lan mang du gnas shing 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]skyes pa rnams la phyis nges pa 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes te/_de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pas bar du bcad cing sgom par byed rab tu bsgom zhing bsgom ste/_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_
[\[68a.2\]]rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pas sems la lan mang du gnas shing the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa skyes pa rnams las/_phyis nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes te/_de the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pas rab tu bcad cing sgom
[\[68a.3\]]par byed/_rab tu bsgom zhing bsgom ste/_'di ltar na bsngags par ma 'os pa'i bsam gtan gyi bsngags pa mi gsung ngo /_/ji ltar na bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa gsung zhe na/_'char byed 'di na dge slong 'dod pa las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba las dben zhes bya ba
[\[68a.4\]]nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_'di ltar na bsngags par 'os pa bsngags so/_/kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas bsngags par mi 'os pa'i bsam gtan gyi bsngags pa mi gsung zhing /_bsngags par 'os pa'i
[\[68a.5\]]bsngags pa gsung ngam/_kun dga' bo bdag la yang bya ba mang po dang bya ba mang du mchis kyis 'gro bar bya'o/_/'char byed de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/_de nas chen por grags pa'i ma ga d+hA'i bram ze 'char byed tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bshad pa la
[\[68a.6\]]mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ste/_stan las langs te song ngo zhes gsungs so/_/gal te tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres par gsungs pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba la/_lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i mthar gsus po che'i mdo las byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum
[\[68a.7\]]pa 'di nyid du/_de las byung ba'i tshor ba drug_/lnga ni lus kyi'o sems kyi gzhan/_/zhes bya bar tshe dang drod gnyis lhan cig cing 'dres par gsungs pa'i phyir skad cig ma nges par grub po zhes bya bar bris zin to//_//'dam bu'i shog gnyis bzhin zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che gnyis rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod phung po'i ri la brten te gnas to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che gang na ba der
[\[68b.2\]]nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' ba dang yang dag par bde ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che la 'di skad
[\[68b.3\]]ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs su 'byed na bdag phyogs cung zad cig yongs su 'dri'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dris shig dang thos nas rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che rga ba yod dam/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
[\[68b.4\]]yod do/_/'chi ba yod dam/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ci rga ba dang 'chi ba dag rang gis byas sam/_gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_'on te rga ba dang 'chi ba dag rang gis kyang ma byas gzhan
[\[68b.5\]]gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med par byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rga ba dang 'chi ba ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_rga ba dang 'chi ba dag ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las kyang ma
[\[68b.6\]]byung gi/_'on kyang skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga ba dang 'chi ba byung ngo /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ci skye ba rang gis byas sam/_'on te gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_skye ba dang rga ba dag rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par
[\[68b.7\]]rgyu med pa las byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_skye ba ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin no/_/'on kyang srid pa'i
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]rkyen gyis skye ba byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ci srid pa rang gis byas sam/_'on te gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_'on te srid pa rang gis kyang ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /_
[\[69a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu srid pa ni rang gis kyang ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_srid pa ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/_'on kyang len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa'o/_/tshe dang
[\[69a.3\]]ldan pa gsus po che ci len pa rang gis byas sam/_'on te gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_'on te len pa rang gis kyang ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu len pa ni rang gis ma byas shing
[\[69a.4\]]gzhan gyis ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_len pa ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/_'on kyang srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che srid pa rang gis byas sam/_'on te
[\[69a.5\]]gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_'on te sred pa rang gis kyang ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sred pa ni rang gis kyang ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan
[\[69a.6\]]gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_sred pa rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/_'on kyang tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che tshor ba rang gis byas sam/_/'on te gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing
[\[69a.7\]]gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_'on te tshor ba rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba ni rang gis kyang ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa yang ma yin gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_tshor ba rang gis ma byas
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/_'on kyang rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che reg pa rang gis byas sam/_'on te gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_'on te reg pa rang
[\[69b.2\]]gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu reg pa ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_reg pa rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang
[\[69b.3\]]ma yin te/_'on kyang skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che skye mched drug rang gis byas sam/_'on te gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing /_gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_'on te skye mched drug rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis
[\[69b.4\]]ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye mched drug ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis ma byas pa yang ma yin la/_skye mched drug ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/_
[\[69b.5\]]'on kyang ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ming dang gzugs rang gis byas sam/_'on te gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_ming dang gzugs rang gis ma byas/_gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu
[\[69b.6\]]med pa las byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ming dang gzugs ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_ming dang gzugs ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/_'on
[\[69b.7\]]kyang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che rnam par shes pa rang gis byas sam/_'on te gzhan gyis byas sam/_'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam/_'on te rnam par shes pa rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis kyang
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_rnam par shes pa rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med pa las
[\[70a.2\]]byung ba yang ma yin te/_'on kyang ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che snga mas phyi ma dang /_phyi mas snga ma 'di ji ltar rigs par 'gyur te/_de ltar tshe dang ldan pa gsus po ches 'di skad du/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ming dang
[\[70a.3\]]gzugs ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis ma byas la/_rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la/_ming dang gzugs rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin no/_/'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs byung
[\[70a.4\]]ngo zhes bshad pa la/_da ltar ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa byung ngo zhes tshe dang ldan pa gsus po ches bshad pa'i don mi shes te/_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po ches bshad pa'i don 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/_de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus skyes bu mkhas pa rnams ni
[\[70a.5\]]dpes rnam par bshad pa'i don shes par 'gyur bas re zhig dpe nyon cig_/dper na 'dam bu'i shog gnyis blang ba dag phan tshun bsten cing phan tshun 'brel ba dang /_phan tshun bsten cing gnas te/_de las 'ga' zhig gis gcig blangs nas gnyis pa lhung bar gyur pa de bzhin du/_
[\[70a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ches gnyis po 'di dag ni phan tshun bsten pa phan tshun 'brel ba/_phan tshun bsten cing gnas pa ste/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs yin zhing /_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ji ltar ston
[\[70a.7\]]pa'i nyan thos mkhas pa gsal ba dul ba 'jigs pa med pa 'chi ba med pa dang /_'chi ba med pa'i khams lus kyis mngon sum byas shing bsgrubs te gnas pa dag gis 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin zab cing zab pa'i dris pa dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad nas lung bstan pa
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]legs so legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ni tshangs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag gis spyi bo la thod bzhin du thogs te/_blta ba'i phyir 'gros rnyed pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o/_/bdag cag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/_bdag cag tshe dang
[\[70b.2\]]ldan pa gsus po che blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang /_bsnyen bkur rnyed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che bdag cag sum cu pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa la bdag mngon par spro zhing bstod la rjes su yi rang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dge slong na ba dang 'chi ba la yid
[\[70b.3\]]'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa'i chos ston par byed na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes bya'o/_/skye ba dang /_srid pa dang /_len pa dang /_sred pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_reg pa dang /_skye mched drug dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_rnam par shes pa la skyo
[\[70b.4\]]ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa'i chos ston par byed na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gsum po che na ba dang 'chi ba la yid 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gag pa rtogs na dge slong chos kyi gtam
[\[70b.5\]]smra ba zhes bya'o bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du rnam par shes pa la yid 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa dag rtogs par gyur na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dge slong na ba dang 'chi ba la yid 'byung ba dang /_'dod
[\[70b.6\]]chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa dang nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che skye ba dang /_srid pa dang /_len pa dang /_sred pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_reg pa dang /_skye mched drug dang /_
[\[70b.7\]]ming dang gzugs dang /_rnam par shes pa la yid 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ston pa'i nyan thos
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]mkhas pa gsal ba dul ba 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang bsnyen bkur rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/_legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis phan tshun du mngon par dga' zhing rjes su
[\[71a.2\]]yi rangs nas stan las langs te song ngo zhes gsungs so/_/gang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba la/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mdo de dang /_de las 'don te/_gang yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'gro ba dang 'ong ba
[\[71a.3\]]bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la/_phung po'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'i mngon par mi byed ces bya ba'i mdo'i mtha' las 'byung ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'i mdo gsum par sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i mdo gsum pa las byung ba mdzod
[\[71a.4\]]kyi gnas drug pa 'di nyid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bsam par sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas so zhes bya ba der bshad zin to/_/zas bzhi gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi yang dag par ldan pa'i sgo dang po las
[\[71a.5\]]bu'i sha'i dpes bstan pa mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du/_'gro ba zas kyi gnas pa yin/_/zhes bya bar zas kyi dbang du byas te/_bshad pa blta bar bya'o/_/gal te kham du byed pa'i zas za ba'i lha rnams las 'das te zhes bya ba la/_lung bar ma'i bdun pa las sdom gyi tshigs
[\[71a.6\]]su bcad pa tha ma las 'char byed kyi mdo las 'don te/_de'i mdo'i dum bu yang mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa'i/_'gog pa dang po mi nang du/_/zhes bya bar bstan te/_gzhan du na 'char byed kyi mdo las 'gal lo zhes bya bar bris pa blta bar bya'o/_/dga' ba'i zas zhes gsungs pa'i
[\[71a.7\]]phyir zhes bya ba la/_ji ltar re zhig brgya byin gyis dris pa'i mdo las mdzod kyi gnas drug pa 'di nyid du/_'dod par tshe yongs gyur pa'i 'phags/_/khams gzhan du ni 'gro mi byed/_/ces bshad zin to/_/gzugs med pa rnams ni gzugs las nges par 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba la/_
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/nges par 'byung ba'i khams ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'dod pa rnams las nges par 'byung ba ni gzugs can rnams so/_/gzugs med pa rnams ni gzugs las nges par 'byung ba yin no/_/gang cung zad mngon par sems shing mngon par 'dus byas pa de
[\[71b.2\]]dag 'gags pa ni nges par 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag ces bya ba la/_lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'i phyi ma las ba lang skyong gi mdo las byung ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag par ldan pa'i lus su gtogs
[\[71b.3\]]pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_rnam grangs rnam par bshad pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo dgu pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa 'di nyid du dbang po'i rna ba bshad par gzugs na drug go zhes bshad zin to/_/gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can dag
[\[71b.4\]]kyang yod ces bya ba la/_mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun dang /_sems can gyi gnas dgu bstan pa'i mdo sems can lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa zhes bya ba nas/_sems can gyi ni gnas dgur 'dod/_/ces bya bar bshad zin to/_/
[\[71b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan dag la ni zhes bya ba la/_nyan thos kyi rnam par bshad pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu pa las byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du srid pa bar ma'i rnam pa yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa bkod par mdo rgyas par bris zin to/_/gal
[\[71b.6\]]te de la yang 'di ltar 'du shes ni nad do/_/'du shes ni 'bras so zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'bras dang
[\[71b.7\]]'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal ba'o zhes rnam par shes pa 'dis shes par gyur na/_'di ni thams cad rig pa'i shes pa/_'di ni thams cad tshor ba'i shes pa'o zhes 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ste/_dge slong dag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ni thams cad ma rig pa la thams cad
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]rig pa'i nga rgyal can/_thams cad ma tshor ba la thams cad tshor ba'i nga rgyal can 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su ma bsal ba la 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal ba'i nga rgyal can te/_dge slong dag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ste/_'du shes ni
[\[72a.2\]]nad do/_/'du shes ni 'bras so/_/'du shes ni zug rngu'o/_/'du shes med pa ni kun du rmongs pa'o/_/'di lta ste 'du shes med 'du shas med min skye mched ni zhig/_'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam bsgoms nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams
[\[72a.3\]]dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/dge slong dag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba can/_'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing yongs su ma grol ba/_'jig tshogs can te/_de gnas de nas 'chi 'phos nas 'di lta bu 'ong bar 'gyur te/_skye gnas dman pa byi la'i skye
[\[72a.4\]]gnas su skye bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag gang zhig 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal ba'o zhes rnam par shes pa 'dis yongs su shes par gyur na/_'di ni thams cad rig pa'i shes pa/_'di ni thams cad tshor ba'i shes pa'o zhes smra ba 'di ni yang dag par smra ba ste/_ci'i phyir
[\[72a.5\]]de'i yang dag par smras pas smra ba yin zhe na/_'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal ba'o zhes rnam par shes pa 'dis shes par gyur na 'di ni thams cad rig pa'i shes pa 'di ni thams cad tshor ba'i shes pa ste/_dge slong dag ji ltar thams cad rig pa yin zhe na/_'di ni
[\[72a.6\]]dge slong rig pa'i skye mched drug rnams kyi kun 'byung ba dang /_mi snang ba dang /_ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa ste/_'di ltar na dge slong thams cad rig par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ji ltar na dge slong thams cad
[\[72a.7\]]tshor ba yin zhe na/_'di na dge slong tshor ba rnams kyi kun 'byung ba dang /_mi snang ba dang /_ro myang ba dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te/_'di ltar na dge slong thams cad tshor bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'bras zhes bya ba 'di ni
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]lus gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhis bskyed cing pha dang ma'i mi gtsang ba las yang dag par byung ba zan dron dang 'bras chan gyis gsos shing /_rtag tu khrus dang byug pa byas kyang 'jig cing gyes pa'i chos can gyi de'i tshig bla dgas so/_/dge slong dag 'bras kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba
[\[72b.2\]]'di ni mig ni yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba'i gzugs la 'dzag cing /_rna ba ni sgra/_sna ni dri/_lce ni ro/_/lus ni reg bya dang /_yid ni yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba'i chos la 'dzag pa'i phyir ro/_/'bras kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'i tshig bla dgas so/_/gang gi phyir
[\[72b.3\]]dge slong ma rig pa dang srid pa'i srid pa yongs su spangs shing yongs su shes par gyur pa ste/_shing ta la mgo bcad pa ltar drungs phyung zhing mi snang zhing phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du byas pa 'di ni 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal bar yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[72b.4\]]gang sems gnas pa dang yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya ba la/_de dang de las 'don te/_ji ltar re zhig lam gyi tshoms kyi lam gyi yan lag gi sgo'i log pa nyid ces bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'i mdo gsum pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas bzhi par/_rnam gsum dri med
[\[72b.5\]]gzugs gsungs dang /_/'phel dang ma byas lam rdzogs phyir/_/zhes bya ba'i skabs su/_spong ba dag ni chu lon du gsungs zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o/_/'o na mdo las bde ba'i dbang po gang zhe na zhes bya ba la/_lam gyi tshoms [(]gyi [,]kyi[)]dbang po'i sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mtha'i cha
[\[72b.6\]]las 'byung ba blta bar bya ste/_'di nyid kyi mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par/_lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang /_/sdug bsngal dbang po zhes bya bar bshad zin to/_/bde ba lus kyis myong ba zhes bya ba la bsam gtan gyi rnam par byed pa de dang de las 'di ltar 'don te/_de dga' ba las 'dod chags
[\[72b.7\]]dang bral te/_dran pa shes rab dang ldan zhing btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong ba gang 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan zhing btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes gsungs so/_/gang gi tshe
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dbyar gnas pa'i phyir gshegs so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan
[\[73a.2\]]'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan par mdzad/_yang dag par bskul/_
[\[73a.3\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis rnam grangs du mar yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par bskul/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas
[\[73a.4\]]khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zla ba gsum du chos gos dang
[\[73a.5\]]bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen sman dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad bzhes par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das
[\[73a.6\]]kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i
[\[73a.7\]]rkyen sman dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis nye bar gnas par byas te/_de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag legs so legs so de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum du chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[73b.2\]]mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen sman dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis nye bar gnas par byas kyi/_khyim bdag ma 'ongs pa na mtho ris 'grub par byed pa skal ba khyad par can gyi rnam par smin pa bde ba can gong mar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag 'di tsam kyis dga' bar mi bya ste/_
[\[73b.3\]]'on kyang dus dang dus su rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te/_gnas pa de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song
[\[73b.4\]]ngo /_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de na tshogs shing 'dug par gyur te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song nas ring du lon par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ngo mtshar ro
[\[73b.5\]]zhes bya ba nas 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las brtsams te/_khyim bdag legs so legs so zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum
[\[73b.6\]]du byas shing bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i tshe chos lnga yongs su spong zhing chos lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_chos lnga yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_gang yang 'dod pa nye bar sdud pa'i yid bde ba yongs su spong ba dang /_gang 'dod pa nye bar sdud pa'i yid mi bde ba yongs su
[\[73b.7\]]spong ba dang /_gang yang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i yid bde ba yongs su spong ba dang /_gang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i yid mi bde ba yongs su spong ba dang /_gang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i btang snyoms yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba ste/_chos lnga po 'di dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos lnga po
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa gang zhe na/_dga' ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_bde ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin no/_/shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i dga' ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing bsgrubs
[\[74a.2\]]te gnas zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes gsungs so/_/mdo las kyang lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang zhes bya ba la/_lam gyi tshoms kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo dang po las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas
[\[74a.3\]]gnyis par/_dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs/_/zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang /_mdo las lus shin tu sbyangs pa zhes kyang 'byung ba ma yin nam zhes bya bar bris pa blta bar bya'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na zhes bya ba la/_skye mched drug gi tshogs
[\[74a.4\]]kyis bsdus pa'i sdom dang po'i lam zhes bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'i tha ma las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas dang por/_zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams/_/zhes bya bar bris zin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las zhes bya ba la/_lam gyi tshogs kyi
[\[74a.5\]]dbang po'i sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum par/_nang gi skyon dang chos mtshungs phyir/_/zhes bya bar bstan cing /_'dir sdug bsngal gyis dbang po 'gags so zhes bya bar bshad zin to/_/rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las bsam gtan bzhi pa
[\[74a.6\]]na bde ba'i dbang po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /_/bde ba yang spangs te zhes bya ba la/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i dbang du byas nas mdo de dang de las 'don pa ste/_de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub
[\[74a.7\]]pas bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par btang snyoms yongs su dag par bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes 'byung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gsum ni skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir g.yo ba dang bcas par gsungs zhes bya ba lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]su bcad pa gnyis pa'i dang po'i mdo las te/_mdo dum bu mdzod kyi gnas gsum par/_bzhi pa g.yo ba med pa yin/_/zhes bya bar bshad pa blta bar bya'o/_/mdo las rlung med pa'i mar me dper mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la/_phung po las/_dbyu gu gsum dang gong bu gsum/_/
[\[74b.2\]]lu hi ta yi rnam bshad gnyis/_/zhes bya ba'i lu hi ta'i mdo dang po la rlung med pa'i mar me'i dpe 'di ltar 'don te/_lu hi ta gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos bde ba yang spangs shing /_sdug bsngal ba yang spangs te zhes bya ba nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i tshe sems
[\[74b.3\]]mtho bar mi 'gyur zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi g.yo ba thob ste/_dper na khang pa'am khang pa'i khyams su mar me bzhag pa dud 'gro'am bya'am mis ma bskul zhing ma bskyod pa de srid du mi mtho mi dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi g.yo ba thob po/_/lu hi ta
[\[74b.4\]]gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos bsam gtan can bde ba yang spangs shing zhes bya ba nas bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i sems kyang de'i tshe mtho bar mi 'gyur zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi g.yo ba thob po zhes gsungs so/_/yang ting nge 'dzin thams
[\[74b.5\]]cad mdor bsdus te zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste/_rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes
[\[74b.6\]]gsungs so/_/yang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes gsungs so/_/lam yang gzings
[\[74b.7\]]lta bur gdon mi za bar dor bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/_'di lta ste chu bo gang+gA chus yongs su gang zhing rgyas te bya rog btung du rung ba tsam du gyur la gru'am gzings med par rgyun phyogs dang bzlog phyogs dang pha rol dang tshu rol gyi 'gram du brgal bar mi nus pas/_gang bdag gis rtsa
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]dang /_shing dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo ma mang po dag bsdus te/_gzings byas pa/_gzings la brten cing gzings la gnas te lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas pha rol du 'gro bar bya'o zhes de de ltar rnam par dpyad nas rtswa dang /_shing dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo ma mang
[\[75a.2\]]po dag bsdus te gzings byas nas/_gzings la brten cing gzings la gnas te/_rgyun las bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol tu phyin te/_de nas skyes bu de 'di snyam du gzings 'di ni bdag la phan pa mang po byed pa ste/_bdag gzings 'di la brten cing
[\[75a.3\]]gzings la gnas nas rgyun las bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol tu brgal te/_gang bdag gis gzings 'di ni mgo bo'am phrag pa la khur te gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar bya'o zhes/_dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu des phan pa mang po byed
[\[75a.4\]]pa skyes bu de de lta de ltar rtog bzhin du gzings de mgo bo'am phrag pa la khur te/_gang du 'dod pa der 'gro'am/_btsun pa ma lags so/_/de nas skyes bu de 'di snyam du gzings 'dis cung zad phan pa mang po byed pa yin te/_bdag gzings 'di la brten cing gzings la gnas te rgyun las
[\[75a.5\]]bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol gyi ngos su brgal bar byas kyang bdag gis gzings 'di thang las bskyur ba'am chu'i rgyun la bskyur bar bya'o zhes des gzings de thang la bskyur ba'am chu'i rgyun du bskyur te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro na/_dge slong dag
[\[75a.6\]]'di ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de gzings de la de lta de ltar rtog pa na bya ba byas pa yin nam/_btsun pa de bzhin no/_/dge slong dag de bzhin du ngas bstan pa'i chos rnams kyang nges par 'byung ba'i phyir yin gyi/_yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/dge slong dag
[\[75a.7\]]de lta bas na ngas gzings lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa dag shes nas sngar chos ma yin pa bzhin du chos kyang spang bar bya'o zhes lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa bkra shis pa'i mdo las 'byung ngo /_/dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo/_/zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]na'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni rnam pa gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/gzhan yang ting nge
[\[75b.2\]]'dzin gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin no zhes gsungs so/_/yang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi ste zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan
[\[75b.3\]]du yod pa na'o/_/ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba yang yod/_ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na
[\[75b.4\]]shes par 'gyur ba dang mthong bar 'gyur ba yang yod/_ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na shes rab rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ba yang yod/_ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na zag pa zad par 'gyur ba yang yod do/_/ting
[\[75b.5\]]nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bstan goms par byas lan mang du byas na mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di na dge slong lus 'di rab tu dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde bas mngon par gang zhing rgyas la khyab ste/_'di lta ste rab tu dben pa las skyes pa'i
[\[75b.6\]]dga' ba dang /_bde ba lus 'di la ma khyab pa'i cha cung zad kyang med par khyab par gnas pa ste/_dper na khrus mkhan nam khrus mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas 'dag chal gyi phye ma zhib mo dag zangs gzhong ngam 'khar gzhong ngam nya phyis kyi nang du chu dang bcug nas sbangs na gong du de rlan pa dang rlan
[\[75b.7\]]pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /_phyi dang nang dag rlan pas khyab cing sla ba dang 'thor bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di na dge slong lus 'di zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yongs su bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na shes par 'gyur ba dang mthong bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di na dge slong snang ba'i 'du shes legs par rab tu bzung zhing legs par yid la byas legs par mngon sum du byed cing bsgom pa ste/_
[\[76a.2\]]nyin mo ji lta bar mtshan mo de bzhin/_mtshan mo ji lta bar nyin mo de bzhin/_snga ma ji lta bar phyis de bzhin/_phyis ji lta bar sngar de bzhin/_steng du ji lta bar 'og tu de bzhin/_'og tu ji lta bar steng du de bzhin no zhes 'di ltar bdag gi sems mun pa'i rnam par ma gyur cig ces
[\[76a.3\]]sems ma bsgrims shing snang ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i sems sgrib pa med pa sgom par byed/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na shes par 'gyur ba dang mthong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang
[\[76a.4\]]du byas na shes rab rab tu rnam par 'byed par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di na dge slong tshor ba'i skye ba rig cing tshor ba'i skye ba rnam par rig la/_tshor ba'i gnas pa rig cing tshor ba'i gnas pa rnam par rig la/_mi snang ba dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs pa rnam par rig go/_/de dran pa dang
[\[76a.5\]]ldan bzhin du 'du shes rnam par rig cing rnam par rtog pa'i skye ba rnam par rig cing gnas pa rnam par rig la/_mi snang ba dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs pa rnam par rig ste/_de yang dran pa dang ldan bzhin du ste dran pa dang mi ldan par ni ma yin te/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du
[\[76a.6\]]bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na shes rab rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na zag pa zad par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di ni dge slong nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa rjes su lta zhing gnas te/_
[\[76a.7\]]'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin kun 'byung ba/_'di ni gzugs kyi mi snang ba/_'di ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba/_'di ni rnam par shes pa'i mi snang ba'o zhes nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams kyi skye ba
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]dang 'jig pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na zag pa zad par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/ngas 'di la dgongs nas pha rol du 'gro ba dag gis dris pa la rnam par bshad do/_/'dod pa'i 'du shes yid mi bde/_/gnyi ga
[\[76b.2\]]rab tu spang bar bya/_/rmugs dang gnyid dag spang bya ste/_/rgod dang 'gyod pa spang bar bya/_/chos la rtog pa sngon 'gro bas/_/btang snyoms yongs dag dran pa can/_/kun shes ma rig rab spangs shing /_/rnam thar brtul zhugs can zhes bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/tshad med pa ni rnam pa
[\[76b.3\]]bzhi/_/zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/tshad med pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms so zhes gsungs so/_/gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir/_/zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/
[\[76b.4\]]dge slong dag byams pa bsgoms shing byams pa kun du bsten byams pa lan mang du byas na gnod sems rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag snying rje bsgoms snying rje kun du bsten snying rje lan mang du byas na rnam par 'tshe ba rab tu spong bar 'gyur
[\[76b.5\]]ro zhes gsungs so/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag dga' ba bsgoms shing dga' ba kun du bsten dga' ba lan mang du byas na mi dga' ba rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag btang snyoms bsgoms shing btang
[\[76b.6\]]snyoms kun du bsten btang snyoms lan mang du byas na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/phyogs gcig nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi rab tu rgyas par byed do zhes bya ba la/_gsum tshan gsum pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum gyi
[\[76b.7\]]mdo de dang de las mngon pa mdzod kyi gnas bzhi par bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'i skabs su bris te/_de las 'di ltar 'don te/_'di na kha cig byams pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i sems khon med pa 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa legs par bsgoms pa/_
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]phyogs gcig tu mos shing khyab par byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_steng dang 'og dang logs kyi 'jig rten thams cad byams pa lhan cig par gyur pa'i sems kho na med pa
[\[77a.2\]]'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa legs par bsgoms pa/_phyogs gcig tu mos shing khyab par byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so zhes gsungs so/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/rnam par thar pa ni rnam pa brgyad de/_brgyad
[\[77a.3\]]gang zhe na/_gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum
[\[77a.4\]]pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs shing nye bar gnas te 'di lta ste/_nam
[\[77a.5\]]mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs shing nye bar gnas te/_'di
[\[77a.6\]]lta ste/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/_'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_ci yang med do zhes ci yang med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs shing nye bar gnas te/_'di lta
[\[77a.7\]]ste/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/_'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs shing nye bar gnas te/_'di lta ste 'du shes med 'du shes med min
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/_'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/_'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad
[\[77b.2\]]pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad/_/ces bya ba la/_brgyad las 'phros pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'i mdo bzhi pa las 'byung ba/_mdzod kyi gnas dang po 'di nyid du/_de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs pa/_/zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang /_de
[\[77b.3\]]bzhin du/_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug_/ces bya bar bris par blta bar bya'o/_/zad par gyi skye mched ni bcu ste zhes bya ba la/_bcu las 'phros pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa dang /_yang dag par 'gro ba'i rnam grangs kyi mdo bcu pa'i tha ma las 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi mdzod kyi
[\[77b.4\]]gnas dang por bsdus pa'i skabs su de bzhin du zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya bar bris par blta bar bya'o/_/chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba las/_gnas brgyad pa phal cher mdo dang sbyar ba rdzogs so//_//de ltar mod kyi ci bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[77b.5\]]gzugs bdag ma yin no zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/dge slong dag gzugs 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag bdag ma yin na da ltar byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_dge slong dag 'di ltar mthong ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'das pa'i gzugs la btang snyoms
[\[77b.6\]]su 'gyur zhing ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs la mngon par mi dga' la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs la yid 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag bdag ma yin na da ltar byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos
[\[77b.7\]]te/_dge slong dag 'di ltar mthong ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'das pa'i gzugs la btang snyoms su 'gyur zhing /_ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs la mngon par mi dga' la/_da ltar byung ba'i gzugs la yid 'byung ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/gnyis
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la/_skye mched drug gi tshogs las 'don te/_de yang mdzod kyi gnas lnga par 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa bsam par bya'o zhes bya bar rnam par bshad pa bstan la/_mdzod kyi gnas gsum par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
[\[78a.2\]]skabs su reg pa'i yan lag rnam par dbye ba bris par blta bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge slong dag mig gi rgyu dang gzugs kyi rkyen la brten te zhes bya ba la/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/_/de nas dge slong gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan
[\[78a.3\]]'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis mig gi rnam par shes pa skye/_btsun pa rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi
[\[78a.4\]]rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur/_dge slong mig gi rgyu dang gzugs kyi rkyen la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig gi rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni mig dang gzugs la brten te byung ba'o/_/rna ba'i rgyu dang sgra'i rkyen la brten nas rna ba'i
[\[78a.5\]]rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni rna ba dang sgra la brten nas 'byung ba'o/_/dge slong dag sna'i rgyu dang dri'i rkyen la brten nas sna'i rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sna'i rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba de
[\[78a.6\]]thams cad ni sna dang dri la brten nas byung ba'o/_/lce'i rgyu dang ro'i rkyen la brten nas lce'i rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lce'i rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni lce dang ro la brten nas byung ba'o/_/lus kyi rgyu dang reg bya'i rkyen la brten nas lus kyi rnam par shes
[\[78a.7\]]pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni lus dang reg bya la brten nas byung ba'o/_/yid kyi rgyu dang chos kyi rkyen la brten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang ci yang
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rung ba de thams cad ni yid dang chos la brten nas byung ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/gang rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de yang phung po las 'don te/_'das pa yis ni bzhi dag dang /_/skyo dang yongs su grol ba dang /_/rgyu yis rnam pa gnyis byed cing /_/gnyis
[\[78b.2\]]po gzhan ni ro myang bas/_/zhes bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo bdun pa dang brgyad pa las 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par/_'dus ma byas la de dag med/_/ces bya bar bris pa blta bar bya'o/_/mdo'i tshig 'di skad du bram ze zhes bya ba la/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[78b.3\]]dpa' bo'i sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te ta lar gshegs nas/_ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so/_/ta la'i bram ze shing sA la chen pos dge sbyong gau ta ma dpa' bo'i sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_ta lar gshegs nas ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so zhes thos te/_thos nas thams
[\[78b.4\]]cad rab tu dkar ba'i rgod ma'i shing rta la zhon te/_gser gyi dbyug pa dang ril ba spyi blugs dag thogs nas/_gzhon nu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing /_gzhon nu'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir ta la'i
[\[78b.5\]]nags nas byung ste/_ji srid du shing rtas bgrod par bya ba de srid du shing rtas song zhing shing rtas bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa na rkang gis kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/_nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang
[\[78b.6\]]dag par bde bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ta la'i bram ze shing sA la chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gau ta ma dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs 'byed na bdag phyogs cung zad cig dri'o/_/bram ze
[\[78b.7\]]ji ltar 'dod bzhin du dris shig_/gau ta ma dbang po lnga po 'di dag ni spyod yul tha dad pa/_yul tha dad pa/_rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong zhing /_gzhan dang gzhan gyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su mi myong ba ste/_mig gi dbang po dang /_rna ba'i dbang po dang /_sna'i dbang po dang /_lce'i
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]dbang po dang /_lus kyi dbang po'o/_/'di dag spyod yul dang yul ci zhig nyams su myong zhing 'di dag ci zhig la brten pa lags/_bram ze dbang po lnga po 'di dag ni spyod yul tha dad pa/_yul tha dad pa/_rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong zhing /_gzhan dang
[\[79a.2\]]gzhan gyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba ste/_'di ltar mig gi dbang po dang /_rna ba'i dbang po dang /_sna'i dbang po dang /_lce'i dbang po dang /_lus kyi dbang po'o/_/'di dag ni yid kyi spyod yul nyams su myong zhing /_'di dag ni yid la brten pa'o/_/gau ta ma yid gang la brten/_
[\[79a.3\]]bram ze yid ni dran pa la brten pa'o/_/gau ta ma dran pa gang la brten/_bram ze dran pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brten to/_/gau ta ma dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang la brten/_bram ze dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la brten to/_/gau ta ma byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang
[\[79a.4\]]la brten/_bram ze byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la brten to/_/gau ta ma rig pa dang rnam par grol ba gang la brten/_bram ze rig pa dang rnam par la ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la brten to/_/gau ta ma mya ngan las 'das pa gang la brten/_bram ze ha cang thal ches te/_
[\[79a.5\]]dris pa'i mtha' bsdu bar mi nus so/_/nga'i drung du tshangs par spyod pa bsten pa rnams ni sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing sdug bsngal mthar byas nas mya ngan las 'das par 'gro zhing /_mthar mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ta la'i bram ze shing sA la chen po bcom ldan 'das
[\[79a.6\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/srog chags drug pa lta bu'i mdo las zhes bya ba la/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/_dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_skyes bu mdze can lus nyams pa
[\[79a.7\]]lus smin pa dbang po sdug bsngal gyis nye bar bcom pa dag smyig ma'i nags su zhugs na/_smyig ma'i lo ma dang tsher ma dag lus la zug cing /_rtswa dang shing dang rkang pa la zug cing /_de'i rgyus sdug bsngal so sor myong bar 'gyur ro/_/drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba nyid so
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'di na kha cig reg pa'i skye mched drug gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/_drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/drug gang zhe na/_mig gi reg pa'i skye mched kyis sdug bsngal so sor
[\[79b.2\]]myong bar 'gyur zhing /_drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba nyid nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal so sor myong bar 'gyur zhing /_drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba nyid so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[79b.3\]]dge slong dag 'di lta ste/_gdug pa can la shing ngam shing gi sdong po dag gis snad na sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing /_nad dang bcas pa dang /_chu ser dang /_rnag 'dzag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di na skyes bu kha cig gtum zhing ngor smra ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur na/_de chung ngu dang mi dga' ba chung
[\[79b.4\]]ngus kyang khro ba dang gnod sems skyed cing yi mug cing gnas te/_khro bar yang dag par byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag skyes bu de'i sems ni mdze can lta bu'o/_/dge slong dag sdom pa ma yin pa dang sdom pa dag bshad par bya ste/_de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_
[\[79b.5\]]bshad par bya'o/_/sdom pa ma yin pa gang zhe na/_dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa dag mig gis gzugs dag mthong nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin la phyis chos rnams la lan mang du rjes su rtog pa dang /_rjes su dpyod par byed do/_/nyes dmigs
[\[79b.6\]]ma mthong zhing nyes dmigs ma mthong bas lus kyis thag sring bar mi byed do/_/dge slong dag byis pa so so skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa dag rna bas sgra dang /_snas dri dang /_lces ro dang /_lus kyis reg bya dang /_yid kyis chos rnam par shes nas mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su
[\[79b.7\]]'dzin la phyis chos rnams la lan mang du rjes su rtog pa dang /_rjes su dpyod par byed de/_nyes dmigs ma mthong zhing nyes dmigs ma mthong bas lus kyis thag sring bar mi byed de/_'di ni sdom pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/sdom pa gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan
[\[80a\]]
