[\[99b.3\]]gzhag pa ni/_khams bdun dag tu 'od 'dod pa ste/_/bdun gang zhe na/_rnam par shes pa drug dang yid/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yid kyi khams kyi bar ro/_/de ltar na phung po lnga dang /_skye mched bcu
[\[99b.4\]]gnyis dang /_khams bco brgyad bstan par 'gyur te/_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa gzugs kyi phung po ni skye mched bcu dang khams bcu dag go/_/tshor ba la sogs pa phung po gsum dang /_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang /_'dus ma byas dag ni
[\[99b.5\]]chos kyi skye mched dang chos kyi khams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yid kyi skye mched dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang /_yid kyi khams so/_/rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ni rnam par shes pa'i phung por bshad pa ma yin nam/_yang de dag
[\[99b.6\]]las gzhan pa'i yid kyi khams de dag gang zhe na/_gzhan ni gang yang ma yin te/_de dag nyid/_drug po 'das ma thag pa yi/_/rnam shes gang yin de yid do/_/rnam par shes pa gang 'gags ma thag pa de nyid ni yid kyi khams zhes bya ste/_dper na bu nyid phar 'gyur
[\[99b.7\]]ba dang /_'bras bu de nyid gzhan gyi sa bon yin pa lta bu'o/_/de lta na 'o na ni rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang /_yid kyi rnam shes gcig gi nang du gcig 'dus pa'i phyir rdzas su na khams bcu bdun nam bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/de lta 'ang yin mod kyi 'on kyang /_drug pa'i
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]rten ni rab bsgrub phyir/_/khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga po dag gi rten lnga ni mig gi khams la sogs pa yin na drug pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten ni gzhan med do/_/de'i phyir rten rab tu bsgrub pa'i ched du yid kyi khams
[\[100a.2\]]bstan to/_/de ltar na rten dang brten pa dang dmigs pa drug tshan rnam par gzhag pas khams bco brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/de la phung po de dag gis ni 'dus byas thams cad bsdus so/_/nye bar len pa'i phung po dag gis ni zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad bsdus so/_/skye mched dang
[\[100a.3\]]khams dag gis ni chos thams cad bsdus so/_/mdor bsdu na/_phung po dang ni skye mched dang /_/khams gcig gis ni thams cad bsdus par shes par bya ste/_gzugs kyi phung po dang /_yid kyi skye mched dang /_chos kyi khams kyis chos thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[100a.4\]]bsdu ba de dag ni gang dang gang nas 'byung yang rung /_rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te/_gzhan gyi dngos pos ni ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhan gyi dngos dang mi ldan phyir/_/chos ni gzhan gyi dngos po dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na gang dang mi ldan pa de nyid kyis
[\[100a.5\]]bsdus par yang mi rung ngo /_/mig dang /_rna ba dang sna dag gnyis gnyis yod pa'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na/_mi 'gyur te/_gang gi phyir/_mig la sogs pa gnyis mod kyi/_/rigs dang spyod yul rnam par shes/_/'dra ba'i phyir na khams gcig
[\[100a.6\]]nyid/_/de la rigs 'dra ba ni gnyis ka mig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/_/spyod yul 'dra ba ni gnyis ka'i yul gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam par shes pa 'dra ba ni gnyis ka mig gi rnam par shes pa gcig gi rten yin pa'i phyir te/_de lta bas na mig gi khams ni gcig pa nyid
[\[100a.7\]]do/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dag la yang sbyor bar bya'o/_/mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis byung ngo /_/mig la sogs pa'i khams gcig pa nyid yin yang rten mdzes par bya pa'i phyir gnyis byung ngo /_/phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dag bshad zin to/_/phung po dang /_khams dang skye
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]mched kyi don gang yin pa 'dir brjod par bya ste/_spungs dang skye sgo rigs kyi don/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams yin/_/spungs pa'i don ni phung po'i don to/_/sems dang sems las byung ba rnams skye ba'i sgo'i don ni skye mched kyi don to/_/rigs kyi don ni khams kyi don to/_/
[\[100b.2\]]rigs kyang 'byung gnas so/_/yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po la sogs pa'i sgo nas bstan pa rnam pa gsum rtsom par mdzad ce na/_smras pa/_gdul bya rnams kyi/_rmongs dbang 'dod rnams gsum gyi phyir/_/phung po la sogs gsum bstan to/_/sems
[\[100b.3\]]can rnams kyi rmongs pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_kha cig sems las byung ba rnams la ril po'i bdag tu 'dzin pas rmongs so/_/kha cig ni gzugs kho na la'o/_/kha cig ni gzugs dang sems dag la'o/_/dbang po dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste/_dbang po rnon po dang /_'bring dang /_
[\[100b.4\]]rtul po'i phyir ro/_/'dod pa yang rnam pa gsum ste/_bsdus pa dang /_bar ma dang /_rgya chen po 'dod pa'i phyir te/_de dag la go rims bzhin du phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams gsum bstan te zhes grag go/_/yang ci'i phyir na sems las byung ba gzhan rnams ni 'du byed
[\[100b.5\]]kyi phung po gcig tu bsdus la 'du shes dang tshor ba dag ni logs shig tu phung por byas she na/_smras pa/_rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa dang /_/'khor ba'i rgyu phyir rim rgyu'i phyir/_sems byung rnams las tshor ba dang /_/'du shes logs shig phung por gzhag_/rtsod pa'i rtsa
[\[100b.6\]]bdag ni gnyis te 'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa dang /_lta ba la lhag par zhen pa'o/_/de gnyis kyi rgyu'i gtso bo ni go rims bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dag ste/_tshor ba'i ro myangs pa'i dbang gis ni 'dod pa rnams la mngon par zhen la/_'du shes phyin ci log gi dbang gis
[\[100b.7\]]ni lta ba rnams la ste/_de gnyis ni 'khor ba'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin te/_tshor ba la zhen cing 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa ni 'khor ro/_/gang yang phung po'i go rims kyi rgyu ston par 'gyur ba'i go rims kyi rgyu de'i phyir yang 'di gnyis logs shig tu phung por byas par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]'o na ci'i phyir skye mched dang khams dag tu ni 'dus ma byas bshad la/_phung bo dag tu ni ma yin zhe na/_phung po dag tu 'dus ma byas/_/don du mi rung phyir ma bshad/_/de ni phung po dag gi nang du brjod pa na de ni gzugs ma yin zhing /_rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ma
[\[101a.2\]]yin pas don du mi rung ba'i phyir re zhig de dag nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar ni mi nus so/_/phung po drug par brjod par yang mi nus so/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_don du mi rung ba'i phyir te/_spungs pa'i don ni phung po'i don to zhes bshad na 'dus ma byas ni gzugs bzhin du 'di ltar de dag thams cad gcig
[\[101a.3\]]tu bsdus nas 'dus ma byas kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa ma yin no/_/rim ni rags dang kun nyon mongs/_/gnod sogs don khams ji bzhin no/_/gzugs ni thogs pa dang bcas phyir rags so/_/gzugs can
[\[101a.4\]]ma yin pa rnams kyi nad na yang tshor ba'i rgyu ba rags pa'i phyir te/_'di ltar nga'i lag pa la tshor ro/_/de'i rkang pa la tshor ro zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/_/'du shes ni gnyis pas ches rags so/_/rnam par shes pa bas ni 'du byed de/_de'i phyir gang ches rags pa de sngar bshad do/_/
[\[101a.5\]]yang na thog ma med pa can 'khor ba na pho dang mo dag phan tshun gzugs la mngon par dga' ste/_de dag kyang tshor ba'i ro myang ba la chags pa'i phyir ro/_/de la chags pa yang 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/phyin ci log de yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dag gis so/_/sems
[\[101a.6\]]kyang de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du byas pas de'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i go rims ji lta ba bzhin no/_/yang na snod la sogs pa'i don gyis te/_gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po ni snod dang /_zas dang /_tshod ma dang /_byan po dang /_za ba po lta bu'o/_/yang
[\[101a.7\]]na khams kyis te/_'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ni 'dod pa'i khams so/_/tshor bas rab tu phye ba ni bsam gtan rnams so/_/'du shes kyis rab tu phye ba ni gzugs med pa gsum mo/_/'du byed tsam gyis rab tu phye ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo ste/_'di dag ni rnam
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]par shes pa'i gnas pa yin la de dag la rnam par shes pa gnas so zhes phung po'i go rims zhing dang sa bon gyi go rims lta bur bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir phung po rnams ni lnga ste mi nyung mi mang ngo /_/rim pa'i rgyu de nyid kyi phyir tshor ba dang /_'du shes dag ni 'du byed rnams las
[\[101b.2\]]logs shig tu phung por byas so/_/gang gi phyir 'di dag ni ches rags pa'o/_/mig la sogs pa'i khams dang skye mched drug gi go rims brjod par bya ste/_de'i dbang nyid kyis na de'i yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rim pa'o/_/drug po de dag las kyang /_da lta'i don phyir dang pe
[\[101b.3\]]lnga/_/mig la sogs pa lnga'i yul ni da ltar ba yin pa'i phyir sngar smos so/_/'byung ba las gyur don phyir bzhi/_/dang por zhes bya bar snyegs so/_/lnga po rnams las kyang bzhi sngar smos pa ni yul 'byung ba las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lus kyi yul ni ma nges te/_res 'ga' ni 'byung ba
[\[101b.4\]]dag yin la/_res 'ga' ni 'byung ba las gyur bdag yin no/_/res 'ga' ni gnyis ka yin no/_/gzhan ni ches ring myur 'jug phyir/_/lhag ma ni ci rigs par ches rgyang ring ba dang /_myur bar 'jug pas gzhan pas sngar smos te/_mig dang rna ba ni yul rgyang ring ba'i phyir gnyis
[\[101b.5\]]pas de dag sngar smos so/_/de gnyis las kyang mig ni ches rgyang ring po la 'jug pa de'i phyir de sngar smos so/_/sna dang lce ni rgyang ring po la 'jug pa med mod kyi de nyid las kyang sna ni ches myur bar 'jug pa'i phyir sngar smos so/_/yang na ji ltar gnas rim bzhin/_/yang na lus 'di la
[\[101b.6\]]mig gi rten ni steng na gnas so/_/de'i 'og na ni rna ba'i'o/_/de'i 'og na ni sna'i'o/_/de nas ni lce'i'o/_/lus kyi ni phal cher de'i 'og na'o/_/yid ni de dag la brten pa dang yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir te/_de dag gi go rims ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin yin no/_/yang ci'i
[\[101b.7\]]phyir gzugs kyi phung po bsdus pa'i skye ma ched bcu po dag las gcig gzugs kyi skye mched du brjod la/_thams cad kyang chos kyi rang bzhin yin na/_gcig chos kyi skye mched ces bya zhe na/_smras pa/_bye brag don dang gtso bo'i phyir/_/chos mang ba dang mchog bsdus phyir/_/
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]gcig ni gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_/gcig ni chos zhes bya bar brjod/_/bye brag gi don ji lta bu zhe na/_ci nas kyang yul dang yul can nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo nas bcu po 'di dag so sor skye mched nyid yin gyi spyir ni ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya ba yin mig
[\[102a.2\]]la sogs pa bye brag tu byas pa dag gis ni gang mig la sogs par ni ming ma btags la/_gzugs ni yin pa de gzugs kyi skye mched du shes par rung bas 'di'i ming gzhan ma brjod do/_/yang gzugs kyi skye mched ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te/_de ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir lag
[\[102a.3\]]pa la sogs pa'i 'dus te reg pa dag gis reg na gzugs su rung ba dang /_bstan du rung ba'i phyir te/_'di ni 'di na'o/_/che ge mo zhig na'o zhes brtag tu rung ba'i phyir ro/_/bye brag gi don nyid kyis gcig ni chos kyi skye mched du bshad kyi thams cad ni ma yin no/_/gzhan yang 'dir tshor
[\[102a.4\]]ba la sogs pa chos mang po rnams bsdus te/_de'i phyir chos kyi sgra spyir rjod par byed do/_/chos kyi mchog mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'dir bsdus te gzhan dag tu ma yin no/_/mdo dag las/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams shes par bya ba gzhan dag kyang dmigs na/_
[\[102a.5\]]ci de rnams 'di dag nyid kyis bsdus sam/_'on te tha dad pa zhig yin zhe na/_'di dag nyid kyis bsdus kyi tha dad pa ni med de/_de la re zhig_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag_/gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag_/tshig gam ming yin de dag ni/_/gzugs dang 'du byed
[\[102a.6\]]dag tu 'dus/_/gang dag gi ltar na sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshig gi rang bzhin yin pa de dag gi ltar na de dag ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus so/_/gang dag gi ltar na ming gi rang bzhin yin pa de dag gi ltar na ni 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus so/_/yang chos kyi phung po'i tshad ni ji tsam zhe na/_kha
[\[102a.7\]]cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer/_kha cig na re de ni chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i chos mngon pa'i tshad tsam mo zhes zer te/_de ni sh+lo ka drug stong ngo /_/yang gzhan dag na re/_phung po la sogs pa gtam re yin zhes zer te/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bar 'byung ba la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud re re ni chos kyi phung po'o zhes zer ro/_/spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni/_/chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs/_/'di skad du sems can rnams kyi spyod pa 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal la sogs pa spyod pa tha dad pa
[\[102b.2\]]brgyad khri yod de/_de dag gi gnyen por chos kyi phung po brgyad khri gsungs so zhes brjod do/_/de ltar chos kyi phung po brgyad khri phung po 'di dag nyid du bsdus pa/_de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par/_/phung po skye mched khams rnams ni/_/rang gi mtshan nyid legs dpyad de/_/ji skad
[\[102b.3\]]bshad par bsdu bar bya/_/mdo gzhan dag las/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams gzhan gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang bstan bcos 'di las ji skad bshad pa bzhin de dag gi rang rang gi mtshan nyid legs par dpyad nas phung po la sogs pa 'di skad bshad pa 'di dag nyid du bsdu bar
[\[102b.4\]]bya ste/_de la re zhig tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dag las tshul khrims kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus so/_/lhag ma rnams ni 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus so/_/zad
[\[102b.5\]]par gyi skye mched bcu po dag las brgyad ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus so/_/'khor rnams dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus te/_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dag kyang
[\[102b.6\]]de dang 'dra'o/_/zad par nam mkha' dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so/_/rnam par grol ba'i skye mched lnga
[\[102b.7\]]po dag ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus so/_/'khor rnams dang bcas na ni sgra dang yid dang chos kyi skye mched rnams kyis bsdus so/_/skye mched gnyis las 'du shes med pa'i sems can ni dri dang ro'i skye mched med pa'i phyir skye mched bcu po
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]rnams kyis bsdus so/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so/_/khams mang po pa las gang dag sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam
[\[103a.2\]]mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams drug bstan pa la/_de dag las gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma bshad na de ci nam mkha'i nyid nam mkha'i khams yin pa'am/_rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams yin par rig par bya'am zhe na/_
[\[103a.3\]]smras pa ma yin no/_/'o na ci zhe na/_sgo dang /_skar khung dang /_kha dang sna la sogs pa'i bu ga nam mkha'i khams zhes bya/_bu ga zhes bya ba ci zhig yin par rig par bya zhe na/_snang dag mun pa dag yin lo/_/bu ga ni snang ba dang /_mun pa dag las gzhan gzung du med do/_/de lta
[\[103a.4\]]bas na nam mkha'i khams ni snang ba dang mun pa'i rang bzhin te/_mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o zhes grag go/_/zag dang bcas pa'i rnam shes ni/_/rnam shes khams yin/_ci'i phyir zag pa med pa la mi bya zhe na/_'di ltar khams drug po 'di dag ni/_
[\[103a.5\]]skye ba'i rten yin par 'dod de/_de dag ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sems nas 'chi ba'i sems kyi bar du skye ba'i gzhir gyur pa ste/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni de lta ma yin no/_/de'i phyir/_de ltar na de dag las khams bzhi ni reg bya'i khams kyi nang du 'dus so/_/lnga pa ni gzugs kyi
[\[103a.6\]]khams kyi nang du 'dus so/_/drug pa ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bdun po dag tu 'dus so/_/gang dag khams bco brgyad bstan pa de dag las bstan du yod pa rnams ni du/_bstan du med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig pu/_/de ni 'di ni 'di na'o/_/che ge mo
[\[103a.7\]]zhig go zhes bstan par nus so/_/lhag ma rnams ni bstan du med pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro/_/thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du/_thogs pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu/_/gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i khams bcu gang dag bshad
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pa de dag ni sgrib pa la thogs pas thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams so/_/lung ma bstan brgyad de dag nyid/_/gzugs sgra ma gtogs dbang po lnga po rnams dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i khams rnams te brgyad po de dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i ngo bor lung bstan du med pa'i phyir lung
[\[103b.2\]]ma bstan dag go/_/gzhan rnam gsum/_sems kyi khams bdun ma chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag ni dge ba yin no/_/chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag ni mi dge ba yin no/_/gzhan dag lung du ma bstan pa yin no/_/chos kyi
[\[103b.3\]]khams ni ma chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_kun nas bslang ba dang /_so sor brtags pas 'gog pa ni dge ba'o/_/chags pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_kun nas bslang ba ni mi dge ba'o/_/gzhan ni lung
[\[103b.4\]]du ma bstan pa yin no/_/gzugs dang sgra'i khams ni lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyis bsdus pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis kun nas bslang ba dag ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dag go/_/'dod pa'i khams su gtogs
[\[103b.5\]]pa dag ni du zhe na/_'dod khams gtogs pa thams cad do/_/gtogs pa ni ma bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gzugs kyi khams na bcu bzhi ste/_/dri dang ro dang sna dang ni/_/lce yi rnam shes khams ma gtogs/_/de na dri dang ro dag med de/_gnyis ni khams kyi zas yin
[\[103b.6\]]pa'i phyir yin la/_de la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyang der skye ba'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na dmigs pa med pa'i phyir sna dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dag kyang med do/_/gzugs med rtogs pa yid dang ni/_/chos dang yid kyi rnam shes khams/_/gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang
[\[103b.7\]]bral ba rnams der skyes te/_de'i phyir gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi khams bcu dang /_de dag la brten pa dang /_dmigs pa rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yang med do/_/zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du/_zag pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_/yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]pa'i chos gang dag bshad pa/_de gsum zag bcas zag pa med/_/gang dag lam gyi bden pa dang 'dus ma byas kyis bsdus pa de dag ni zag pa med pa yin no/_/lhag ma dag ni zag bcas so/_/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du/_rtog
[\[104a.2\]]pa med la dpyod pa tsam dag ni du/_rtog pa yang med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa ni/_rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yin/_/'di dag ni khams rtag tu rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin te/_tha ma gsum ni rnam gsum mo/_/de la yid
[\[104a.3\]]kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag las gzhan pa chos kyi khams mtshungs par ldan pa dag 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po na ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag yin no/_/bsam gtan khyad par can na ni rtog pa
[\[104a.4\]]med cing dpyod pa tsam dag yin no/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi dang /_chos kyi khams mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa thams cad dang /_bsam gtan khyad par can gyi dpyod pa ni rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dag yin no/_/rtog pa ni rtog pa
[\[104a.5\]]gnyis pa yang med pa'i phyir dang /_dpyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir rtog tu rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam yin no/_/lhag ma rnams ni gnyis ka spangs/_/lhag ma ni gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag ste/_de dag ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtag tu rtog pa yang med la
[\[104a.6\]]dpyod pa yang med pa dag yin no/_/gal te rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po rnams rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa dag yin na/_ji ltar na rnam par rtog pa med pa dag ces bya zhe na/_nges par rtog dang rjes dran pa'i/_/rnam par rtog pas rnam mi rtog_/rnam par rtog pa ni rnam pa gsum
[\[104a.7\]]mo zhes grag ste/_ngo bo nyid dang res par rtog pa dang rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o/_/de bas na de dag la ngo bo nyid kyis rtog pa ni yod kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te/_de bas na rnam par rtog pa med pa dag ces bya ste/_dper na rta rkang pa gcig pa la rkang med ces bya ba bzhin no/_/yang
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]sems kyi rang bzhin ngo bo nyid dang /_rjes su dran pa'i rtog pa dag_/de dag yid kyi shes rab g.yeng /_/yid kyi dran pa thams cad nyid/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab ni yid kyi zhes bya'o/_/mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa ni g.yeng ba zhes bya ste/_
[\[104b.2\]]de ni nges par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog ba'o/_/yid kyi dran pa nyid mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i dran pa thams cad ni rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du/_dmigs pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_dmigs
[\[104b.3\]]bcas sems kyi khams bdun no/_/sems kyi khams bdun po de dag ni yul 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/chos kyi phyed kyang /_gang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi khams de ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/lhag ma gzugs can gyi khams bcu po dag dang
[\[104b.4\]]chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig ldan pa ma yin pa ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya bar grub po/_/zin pa rnams ni du/_ma zin pa rnams ni du zhe na/_ma zin dgu/_brgyad po de dag rnams dang sgra/_/sems kyi khams bdun dang chos kyi khams dang /_sgra'i khams rnams ni ma zin pa'o/_/dgu
[\[104b.5\]]po gzhan ni rnam pa gnyis/_/zin pa dag kyang yin ma zin pa dag kyang yin te/_de la mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus da ltar byung ba rnams ni zin pa yin no/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnams ni ma zin pa yin no/_/gzugs dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i khams da ltar
[\[104b.6\]]byung ba dbang po dang tha mi dad pa rnams ni zin pa yin no/_/_gzhan dag ni ma zin pa rnams so/_/zin pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na/_phan pa dang gnod pa dag gis phan tshun mthun par byed pa'i phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rten gyi dngos por nye bar bzung ba ste/_'jig rten na sems
[\[104b.7\]]pa dang bcas pa zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o/_/'byung ba'i rang bzhin du/_'byung ba las gyur pa du yin zhe na/_reg bya rnam pa gnyis yin te/_'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa'o/_/de la 'byung ba dag ni bzhi'o/_/'byung ba las gyur pa ni 'jam pa nyid la sogs pa 'byung ba dag
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/lhag ma gzugs can dgu po ni 'byung gyur te/_dbang po lnga'i khams dag dang yul bzhi'o/_/chos khams phyogs gcig kyang /_'byung ba las gyur pa ste/_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni gnyis ka
[\[105a.2\]]ma yin pa'o/_/bsags pa rnams ni du/_bsags pa ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na/_gzugs can bcu ni bsags pa'o/_/dbang po'i khams lnga dang yul lnga dag ni rdul phra rab 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir bsags pa dag go/_/khams bco brgyad po 'di dag las gcod par byed pa
[\[105a.3\]]ni gang gcad par bya ba ni gang /_sreg par byed pa ni gang /_bsreg par bya ba ni gang /_'jal bar byed pa ni gang /_gzhal bar bya ba ni gang zhe na/_gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid/_/phyi rol gyi ni khams bzhi yin/_/gzugs dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya zhes bya ba ste/_
[\[105a.4\]]dgra sta dang /_shing zhes bya ba la sogs ba'o/_/gcod pa yang 'dus pa'i rgyun 'brel bar 'byung ba can rnam par 'byed pa skyed pa'o/_/dbang po rnams ni gcad par bya ba ma yin te/_gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/gcod par byed pa yang ma yin te/_nor bu'i 'od bzhin du dang ba nyid
[\[105a.5\]]kyi phyir ro/_/ji ltar gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid phyi rol gyi khams bzhi yin pa ltar/_de bzhin bsreg bya 'jal byed pa'o/_/de dag nyid bsreg par bya ba yin la/_de dag nyid 'jal bar byed pa yin no/_/dbang po rnams ni ma yin te/_dang ba'i phyir ro/_/sgra yang ma yin te/_chad
[\[105a.6\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/bsreg dang gzhal la mi mthun smra/_/kha cig na re khams bzhi po sreg par byed pa yang yin la gzhal bar bya ba yang yin no zhes brjod do/_/rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i khams ni du/_rgyas pa las byung ba rnams ni du/_rgyu mthun pa las byung ba
[\[105a.7\]]rnams ni du/_rdzas dang ldan pa rnams ni du/_skad cig ma rnams ni du zhe na/_smras pa/_rnam par smin las skyes pa dang /_/rgyas las byung ba nang gi lnga/_/mig la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang yin la/_rgyas pa las byung ba yang yin no/_/rgyu mthun
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]par byung ba las ni med de/_de dag las ma gtogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de la rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las skyes pa ni/_rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'o/_/zas dang legs par bya ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dag gis rgyas par byas pa rnams ni rgyas pa
[\[105b.2\]]las byung ba dag go/_/sgra ni rgyas pa las byung ba dang /_rgyu mthun pa las byung ba yod kyi/_sgra ni rnam smin las skyes min/_/rang gi 'dod dgur 'byung ba'i phyir/_/rgyu mthun las byung rnam smin skyes/_/thogs pa med pa brgyad/_sems kyi khams bdun po dag dang chos kyi
[\[105b.3\]]khams te skal pa mnyam pa dang /_kun du 'gro ba'i rgyus bskyed pa rnams ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dag go/_/rnam par smin pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag go/_/gzhan rnam gsum/_lhag ma gzugs dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i khams
[\[105b.4\]]dag ste/_de dag ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang /_rgyas pa las byung ba dang /_rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dag kyang yin no/_/rdzas dang lhan cig 'dus ma byas ni brtan pa'i phyir rdzas so/_/de yang chos kyi khams la yod pas chos kyi khams gcig pu rdzas dang ldan pa yin no/_/tha
[\[105b.5\]]ma gsum/_skad cig ma ste/_tha ma de dag yid kyi khams la sogs pa sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i tshogs la skad cig ma gcig rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ma yin par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir skad cig ma zhes bya'o/_/de la sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang mtshungs
[\[105b.6\]]par ldan pa'i sems ni yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no/_/lhag ma de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba rnams ni chos kyi khams so/_/'di dpyad par bya ste gang mig gi khams dang mi ldan pa las ldan pa thob pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa dang yang yin nam/_
[\[105b.7\]]gang mig gi rnam par shes pa dang yin pa de mig gi khams dang yang yin nam zhe na/_smras pa/_mig dang ni/_rnam shes khams dag so so dang /_lhan cig tu yang thob pa yod/_/re zhig so so ni mig gi khams dang yin la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang ma yin pa yang yod
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]de/_'dod pa'i khams na rim gyis mig gi dbang po thob pa'o/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yin la/_mig gi khams dang ma yin pa yang yod de/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pas gzugs lta zhing mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon
[\[106a.2\]]du byed pa na'o/_/lhan cig tu yang ni gnyis ka dang ldan pa 'thob pa yang yod de/_gzugs med pa'i khams nas shi 'phos nas 'dod pa'i khams dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes pa na'o/_/gnyis ka dang ma yin pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o/_/nang gi khams dag
[\[106a.3\]]ni du/_phyi'i dag ni du zhe na/_nang gi bcu gnyis gzugs la sogs ma gtogs pa rnam par shes pa drug dang rten drug go/_/mig la sogs pa ni sems kyi rten nyid du nye ba nyid kyi phyir nang gi'o/_/sems ni ngar 'dzin pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir bdag tu nye bar 'dogs pa'o/_/
[\[106a.4\]]gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi khams drug po dag ni phyi'i yin no/_/rten pa dang bcas pa'i khams rnams ni du/_de dag dang mtshungs pa rnams ni du zhe na/_re zhig mtha' gcig tu/_chos zhes bya ba ni rten pa dang bcas/_rten dang brten par dmigs pa gang rang gi las
[\[106a.5\]]byed pa de ni rten pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gang la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa ma skyes pa'am/_skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khams gang yin pa de dag ni 'ga' yang med de/_de lta bas na chos kyi khams ni rtag tu brten pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/lhag ma ni de dag
[\[106a.6\]]mtshungs pa dag kyang yin/_/kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra brten pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yin pa'o/_/de dag mtshungs pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ci zhig ce na/_gang zhig rang gi las mi byed/_/gang rang gi las mi byed pa de ni brten pa dang bcas pa'o zhes bshad par 'gyur ro/_/de la mig la
[\[106a.7\]]sogs pa dag ni gang gcig gi brten pa dang bcas pa de ni thams cad kyi yin la/_gzugs la sogs pa dag ni gang kho na'i dmigs par gyur pa de kho na'i brten pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/brten pa dang bcas pa ni dngos po'i byed pa la brten pa ste/_de 'di dag la yod pas brten pa dang
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bcas pa rnams sam/_'bras bu la reg pa'i phyir brten pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/yang gang dag brten pa dang bcas pas ma yin pa de dag ni rigs mthun par 'dra ba'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa dag go/_/mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i khams rnams ni du/_bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i
[\[106b.2\]]khams rnams ni du/_spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na/_re zhig gzugs can bcu ni bsgom pas spang bya yin/_lnga yang yin te/_rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga po dag go/_/tha ma gsum rnam gsum/_phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad dang /_/de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba
[\[106b.3\]]dang /_de dag gi thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag yin no/_/zag pa dang bcas pa lhag ma dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no/_/zag pa med pa ni spang bya ma yin pa'o/_/so so'i skye bo nyid dang /_ngan song ba'i lus dang /_ngag gi las dag
[\[106b.4\]]kyang 'phags pa'i lam dang 'gal ba'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzhan yang yod pa ma yin nam zhe na/_de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin te/_mdor bsdu ba ni 'di yin no/_/nyon mongs can min mthong spang min/_/gzugs min drug pa min skyes min/_/nyon mongs pa
[\[106b.5\]]can ma yin pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba cung zad kyang med la/_gzugs kyang ma yin no/_/so so'i skye bo nyid ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i lung du ma bstan pa yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/lus
[\[106b.6\]]dang ngag gi las ni gzugs yin no/_/de lta bas na de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin te/_bden pa dag la log par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/drug pa ma yin pa las skyes pa ni dbang po lnga las skyes pa gang yin pa ste/_de yang mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni med do/_/lta ba ni du/_lta ba ma
[\[106b.7\]]yin pa ni du zhe na/_mig dang chos kyi khams phyogs ni/_lta ba yin te/_de dag gang zhe na/_smras pa/_rnam pa brgyad/_'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa lta ba lnga po dag dang /_'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_slob pa'i lta ba dang /_mi slob pa'i lta ba dang /_chos kyi khams rnam pa
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]brgyad po 'di dag ni lta ba yin no/_/lhag ma ni lta ba ma yin no/_/de la 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'o/_/slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i lta ba ni slob pa'i'o/_/mi slob pa'i
[\[107a.2\]]ni mi slob pa'i'o/_/yang ci'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa kho na la 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya zhe na/_'di ltar/_rnam shes lnga dang mtshungs skyes blo/_/nges rtogs med phyir lta ba yin/_/rtog par byed pa ni lta ba yin te/_nges par sems pa la
[\[107a.3\]]zhugs pa dag yin na/_rnam par shes pa lnga dang lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab ni de lta ma yin te/_de lta bas na 'di ni lta ba ma yin no/_/de nyid kyi phyir shes rab nyon mongs pa can nam/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa gzhan yang lta ba ma yin no/_/'o na mig kyang rtog par byed pa nyid
[\[107a.4\]]med na ji ltar lta ba ma yin zhe na/_gzugs la lta ba'i don gyis te/_gang gi phyir/_mig gis gzugs rnams mthong /_gal te mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur na/_rnam par shes pa gzhan dang ldan pas kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na/_mig thams cad kyis mthong ba
[\[107a.5\]]ni ma yin pa nyid do/_/'o na ci zhe na/_rten bcas rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa dang bcas par gyur pa de'i tshe mthong ngo /_/de lta na 'o na ni mig la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa de kho nas mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na/_de la brten pa'i rnam
[\[107a.6\]]shes min/_/mthong ngo zhes nges par bya ba'i nus pa ni med do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang phyir bar du chod pa yi/_/gzugs ni mthong ba min phyir lo/_/gang gi phyir rtsig pa la sogs pas bar du chod pa'i gzugs mi mthong ngo zhes grag go/_/gal te rnam par shes pas mthong bar gyur
[\[107a.7\]]na de ni thogs pa med pa'i phyir rtsig pa la sogs pa la yang thogs pa med pas gzugs bsgribs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba yang ma yin te/_de bas na rnam par shes pas mi mthong ngo /_/ji ltar yang mig gis mthong ba de bzhin du rna bas thos so/_/snas tshor ro/_/lces
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]myong ngo /_/lus kyis reg go/_/yid kyis rnam par shes so/_/ci mig gcig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngam/_'on te gnyis kas she na/_'di la nges pa med de/_mig ni gnyis ka dag gis kyang /_/mthong ste gsal bar mthong phyir ro/_/mig ni gnyis kas kyang mthong ste/_gnyis ka
[\[107b.2\]]phye na gsal ba rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rten rnam par chad pas rnam par chad pa mthong ba yang med de/_rnam par shes pa ni yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/ci mig la sogs pa rnams yul dang phrad pa zhig gam/_'on te ma phrad pa zhig yin zhe na/_/mig dang yid dang rna
[\[107b.3\]]ba ni/_/yul dang ma phrad/_'di ltar gzugs rgyang ring po nas mthong zhing mig dang phrad pa'i mig sman mi mthong ngo /_/sgra rgyang ring po nas thos so/_/yid ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phyir phrad pa nyid du mi nus so/_/lhag ma sna dang /_lce dang /_lus zhes bya ba/_gsum gzhan du/_yul dang
[\[107b.4\]]phrad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/yang ci mig la sogs pa dag gis bdag nyid kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i don la 'dzin tam/_'on te mnyam pa'am mi mnyam pa zhig la 'dzin ce na/_re zhig gang dag yul dang phrad par bshad pa/_sna la sogs pa gsum po de rnams kyis ni/_yul ni mnyam
[\[107b.5\]]par 'dzin par 'dod/_/dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi yul gyi rdul phra rab rnams dang phrad nas rnam par shes pa bskyed do/_/mig dang rna ba dag gis ni ma nges so/_/yid ni lus can ma yin pas tshad yongs su ma chad pas mi dpyod do/_/da ni gang 'di dag rnam par shes pa'i khams
[\[107b.6\]]drug bshad pa ji ltar de dag gi yul da ltar ba dang dus gsum yin pa ltar rten kyang de lta bu yin nam zhe na/_smras pa ma yin te/_tha ma'i rten 'das/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten ni 'gags ma thag pa'i yid do/_/lnga rnams ni/_de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin/_/de la mig gi rnam par shes
[\[107b.7\]]pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rten ni mig nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang lus yin la/_de dag gi 'das pa'i rten yid yin no/_/yang rnam par shes pa ni gnyis ka la rag lus te skye na ci'i phyir mig la sogs pa kho na la brten ces bya ba'i gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhe na/_de dag
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir/_/brten ni mig la sogs pa yin/_/mig la sogs pa rnams gyur pas rnam par shes pa rnams 'gyur ba yin te/_phan pa dang gnod pa dang /_gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gzugs la sogs pa
[\[108a.2\]]rnams gyur pas de dag 'gyur ba ma yin te/_de'i phyir de kho na rten yin no/_/yang de dag gis ni gzugs la sogs pa rnam par shes na/_ci'i phyir mig la sogs pa rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/_gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma yin zhe na/_gang gi phyir de dag gi rten ni mig
[\[108a.3\]]la sogs pa yin pa/_de phyir thun mong ma yin phyir/_/de dag gis ni rnam shes bstan/_/mig ni rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur bar mi nus la/_gzugs ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs par yang 'gyur la/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs par yang 'gyur te/_
[\[108a.4\]]lus kyi bar du yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/_/de lta bas na rten du gyur pa'i phyir dang /_thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir de dag kho nas rnam par shes pa bstan gyi gzugs la sogs pa ni ma yin te/_dper na rnga bo che'i sgra dang /_nas kyi myu gu bzhin no/_/yang lus gang la gnas te mig gis
[\[108a.5\]]gzugs rnams la lta ba na/_ci lus dang mig dang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa de rnams sa gcig pa kho na zhig yin nam/_'on te gzhan gyis pa yang yin zhe na/_smras pa/_thams cad la bye brag yod de/_de la nges pa 'di yin te/_lus la 'og gi mig ma yin/_/las dang
[\[108a.6\]]mig dang gzugs rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar sa lnga pa yin no/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang sa gnyis pa yin no/_/de las gang sa'i lus yin pa'i sa de ba'am/_sa gong ma'i yin gyi sa 'og ma'i
[\[108a.7\]]ma yin no/_/'di'i mig gi yul ni de'i sa pa 'am sa 'og ma'i gzugs yin gyi/_mig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin/_sa gong ma'i gzugs sa 'og ma'i mig gis mthong bar ni nam yang mi nus so/_/rnam par shes pa'ang /_sa gong ma'i ma yin te/_gzugs bzhin no/_/de yi
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]gzugs/_lus kyi'ang gnyis ka thams cad du de'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni gong ma dang 'og ma dang rang gis pa'i gzugs thams cad du yin la/_lus kyi'ang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa thams cad du yin no/_/ji ltar mig 'di rgyas par bshad pa
[\[108b.2\]]ltar/_rna ba'ang de bzhin/_lus la gong ma'i rna ba min/_/rna bas gong ma'i sgra ma yin/_/rnam par shes pa'ang sgra ni 'di'i/_/lus kyi'ang gnyis ka thams cad du/_/gsum dag ni/_thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid/_/sna dang lce dang lus kyi khams rnams kyi ni lus dang yul dang rnam par
[\[108b.3\]]shes pa rnams rang gis pa kho na yin no/_/spyir bstan nas dmigs kyis bsal ba gsungs pa ni/_lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni/_/rang gi sa pa lus dang lus kyi khams dang reg bya ni rtag tu rang gi sa pa kho na yin no/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni kha cig gi rang gi sa pa yin te 'di
[\[108b.4\]]lta ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/kha cig ni sa 'og ma pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o/_/yid ma nges te/_res 'ga' ni lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_chos
[\[108b.5\]]dag dang mtshungs pa'i sa pa'i yid yin la/_res 'ga' ni sa gong ma dang 'og ma pa yin te/_de nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa'i lus la yang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_skye ba'i tshe yid la sogs pa'i sa thams cad pa dag yin no/_/'di dpyad par bya ste/_khams bco brgyad po rnam par shes pa drug po
[\[108b.6\]]rnams las gang gis shes par bya ba yin zhe na/_smras pa/_gnyis kyi rnam shes phyi yi lnga/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams ni mig la sogs pa la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'o/_/lhag ma khams bcu gsum dag ni yid kyi rnam
[\[108b.7\]]par shes pa nyid kyis shes par bya ba'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro/_/khams bco brgyad po de dag las rtag pa rnams ni du/_mi rtag pa rnams ni du zhe na/_'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o/_/des na chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag la lhag ma rnams ni mi rtag pa yin no/_/dbang po rnams ni du/_
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]dbang po ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na/_chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni/_/bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po/_/de la chos zhes bya ba'i phyed ni srog gi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po bcu gcig dang /_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa la sogs pa dbang po'i cha ste/_chos kyi khams
[\[109a.2\]]kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir ro/_/nang gi bcu gnyis ni mig la sogs pa rang gi ming gis smos pa lnga dang /_yid kyi dbang po ni sems kyi khams bdun no/_/pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni lus kyi phyogs gcig go/_/lhag ma khams lnga po de dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ni dbang po
[\[109a.3\]]ma yin pa zhes bya bar grub po/_/phung po dang khams dang skye mched bstan pa zhes bya ste/_mdzod kyi gnas dang po'o//_//dbang po rnams bshad pa la/_dbang po'i don ni dbang phyug dam pa'o/_/'di dag las gang zhig gang la dbang byed ce na/_lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la dbang byed/_
[\[109a.4\]]re zhig mig dang rna ba dag re re zhing don bzhi bzhi la dbang byed pa ni long ba dang 'on pa dag ni mi mdzes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir lus mdzes par bya ba dang mthong ba dang thos nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir lus yongs su srung ba dang /_mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa dag
[\[109a.5\]]bskyed pa dang /_gzugs la lta ba dang sgra nyan pa dag gi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o/_/sna dang /_lce dang /_lus ni snga ma bzhin du lus mdzes par bya ba la dbang byed pa dang /_de dag gis kham gyi zas la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir lus yongs su srung ba la dbang byed pa dang /_
[\[109a.6\]]rang la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa skyed pa dang /_rang gi lus nyams su myong ba la sngar bzhin du dbang byed pa'o/_/bzhi rnams gnyis la'o/_/re zhig pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni sems can gyi bye brag dang /_khyad par dag la dbang byed de/_de la sems can gyi bye brag ni mo dang pho zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[109a.7\]]sems can gyi khyad par ni nu ma la sogs pa'i dbyibs dang nga ro dang spyod pa gzhan pa nyid do/_/gzhan dag na re ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bdag la dbang byed de/_de dang mi ldan pa la sdom pa ma yin pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par mtshams sbyor
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]ba dang /_yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la dbang byed do/_/yid kyi dbang po ni yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba dang /_rang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa dag la dbang byed do/_/bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga gang yin pa dang /_dad pa la sogs pa brgyad gang yin pa/_lnga dang brgyad po de rnams
[\[109b.2\]]ni/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dang /_/go rims bzhin du dbang byed de/_/bde ba la sogs pa lnga po dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dbang byed de/_de dag la 'dod chags la sogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni/_rnam par byang ba la dbang byed de/_de
[\[109b.3\]]dag ni rnam par byang bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan dag na re/_rang gi don dang thams cad la/_/dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug_/mig la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rang rang gi don la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed do/_/sgra thos pa yang med pa de'i phyir thun mong gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir yid ni
[\[109b.4\]]don thams cad la dmigs pa la dbang byed de/_/de'i phyir de dag ni so sor dbang po'o/_/mo nyid pho nyid la dbang phyir/_/lus las mo dang pho dbang dag_/rnam par bzhag ste/_don tha dad pa dag ni ma yin no/_/mo'i ngo bo ni mo nyid do/_/pho'i ngo bo ni pho nyid do/_/de la pho dang mo dag gi nga ro
[\[109b.5\]]la sogs pa gzhan pa'o/_/ris gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang /_/rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir/_/srog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni/_/dad sogs lnga yang dbang por 'dod/_/srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par gnas par bya ba dang /_tshor ba rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs la dang /_
[\[109b.6\]]dad pa la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rnam par byang ba la dbang byed de/_'di ltar de dag ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon la lam yang 'dren par byed do/_/mya ngan 'das sogs gong nas gong /_/thob pa la ni dbang byed phyir/_/kun shes byed dang kun shes dang /_/de bzhin
[\[109b.7\]]kun shes ldan dbang po/_/de la kun shes byed pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba la dang /_kun shes pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba la dang /_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba la dbang byed do/_/_
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]sogs pa'i sgra ni rnam grangs gzhan du bstan par bya ba'i phyir te/_mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /_mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po gsum dag go/_/dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid yin
[\[110a.2\]]na go/_/ma rig pa la sogs pa kha bskang dgos pa ni ma yin te/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'di ni sems kyi brten dang de'i bye brag_/gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid/_/tshogs dang rnam byang ji snyed pa/_/dbang po rnams kyang de snyed du/_/'dod de/_de la sems kyi rten ni dbang po drug dag yin te/_skye
[\[110a.3\]]mched drug po yang sems can gyi rdzas kyi gzhi yin no/_/mo dang pho'i dbang po dag gis ni de mo dang phor bye brag tu 'byed do/_/srog gi dbang pos ni gnas par byed do/_/tshor ba rnams kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs par byed do/_/dad pa la sogs pa lngas ni rnam par byang ba la sogs pa'i tshogs sogs par byed do/_/
[\[110a.4\]]gsum gyis ni rnam par byang bar byed de/_de'i phyir ma rig pa la sogs pa ni dbang po nyid du mi 'dod do/_/yang na 'jug pa'i rten dang ni/_/skye dang gnas dang nyer spyod las/_/bcu bzhi de bzhin ldog pa la/_/dbang po rnams ni gzhan yin no/_/'jug pa'i rten ni dbang po drug yin no/_/skye
[\[110a.5\]]ba ni mo dang po'i dbang po dag las te/_de las skye ba'i phyir ro/_/gnas pa ni srog gi dbang po ste/_des gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/tshor ba rnams kyis ni nye bar spyod par byed de/_de'i phyir de dag ni dbang po bcu bzhi yin no/_/rnam pa de nyid kyis gzhan dag ni ldog pa yin no/_/gang gi phyir ldog
[\[110a.6\]]pa'i rten ni dad pa la sogs pa yin no/_/skye ba ni kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po yin no/_/gnas pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no/_/kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang pos ni nye bar spyod par byed do/_/de'i phyir dbang po dag ni de snyed cig yin la/_de nyid kyi phyir de dag gi go rims kyang de yin no/_/
[\[110a.7\]]de la dbang po gang dag gzhan du ma bstan pa de dag bstan te/_lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang /_/sdug bsngal dbang po'o/_/sim pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa'o/_/sim pa ni bde ba'o/_/lus kyi tshor ba sim pa ni bde ba'i dbang po'o/_/sim pa zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa ste/_
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]bsam gtan gsum pa na/_sems kyi de ni bde dbang po/_/bsam gtan gsum pa ni sems kyi tshor ba sim pa de nyid bde ba'i dbang po'o/_/gzhan na de yid bde ba yin/_/bsam gtan gsum pa las gzhan pa 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa na ni sems kyi tshor ba sim
[\[110b.2\]]pa gang yin pa de ni yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no/_/sems kyi tshim pa ma yin pa/_/yid mi bde ba'o btang snyoms ni/_/bar ma'o/_/sems pa yang ma yin sim pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa ni bar ma zhes brjod de btang snyoms kyi dbang po'o/_/ci lus kyi'am sems kyi zhes bya zhe na/_smras
[\[110b.3\]]pa/_gnyis ga'i yin no/_/ci'i phyir 'di bsdus nas dbang po gcig tu byas she na/_mi rtog phyir/_sems kyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba ni phal cher rnam par rtog pa las skye'i lus kyis ni ma yin no/_/yul gyi dbang gis ni dgra bcom pa rnams la yang skye bas de'i phyir de dag dbang po nyid du
[\[110b.4\]]tha dad kyi lus kyi dang sems kyi btang snyoms ni rnam par mi rtog pa kho nar rang gi ngang gis skye bas lus kyi dang sems kyi zhes bya ba dbang po gcig tu byas so/_/mthong bsgom mi slob lam la dgu/_/gsum yin/_yid dang bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_btang snyoms rnams dang /_dad
[\[110b.5\]]pa la sogs pa lnga dang /_dbang po dgu po de dag ni mthong ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_mi slob pa'i lam dag la dbang po gsum du brjod do/_/mthong ba'i lam la ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/sgom pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa yin te/_phra rgyas lhag ma spang ba'i
[\[110b.6\]]phyir ro/_/mi slob pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po yin te/_de'i ngang tshul nyid kyi phyir ro/_/dbang po de dag la zag pa dang bcas pa ni du/_zag pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_gsum ni dri ma med/_kun shes byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum bshad
[\[110b.7\]]ma thag pa de ni zag pa med pa yin te/_dri ma rnams ni zag pa'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gzugs can srog dang sdug bsngal dag_/zag pa dang bcas/_dbang po gzugs can bdun dang /_srog gi dbang po dang /_sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dag ni gcig tu zag
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/dgu rnam gnyis/_yid dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_btang snyoms dag dang /_dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang /_dbang po dgu po de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa dag go/_/rnam par smin pa yin pa
[\[111a.2\]]rnams ni du/_ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na/_re zhig gcig tu/_srog ni rnam smin bcu gnyis gnyis/_/bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde/_ma gtogs pa ste/_dad pa la sogs pa tha ma brgyad dang /_yid mi bde ba ma gtogs pa srog gi dbang po las gzhan
[\[111a.3\]]bcu gnyis ni rnam pa gnyis te/_rnam par smin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'o/_/de la mig la sogs pa bdun rgyas pa las byung ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa ma yin no/_/lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'o/_/yid dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_
[\[111a.4\]]btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams ni dge ba dang /_nyon mongs pa can rnams dang /_spyod lam pa dang /_bzo'i gnas pa dang /_sprul pa rnams ni ci rigs par rnam par smin pa ma yin no/_/lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yin pa'o/_/dbang po rnams la rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa ni du/_rnam
[\[111a.5\]]par smin pa med pa rnams ni du zhe na/_gang 'di yid mi bde bar bshad ma thag pa/_de gcig ni/_rnam par smin bcas/_de gcig pu ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa kho na yin no/_/ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kho na zhes bya ba'i don dang /_rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o/_/bcu rnam gnyis/_
[\[111a.6\]]rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yin/_rnam par smin pa med pa dag kyang yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_yid dang tshor gzhan dad la sogs/_/tshor gzhan zhes smos pas ni yid mi bde ba las gzhan pa'i gzung ngo /_/de la yid dang bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_btang snyoms mi dge ba
[\[111a.7\]]dang /_dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa dag yin no/_/zag pa med pa rnams dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin no/_/sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/lung du ma bstan pa ni rnam par smin
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]pa med pa yin no/_/dad pa la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa dag yin no/_/zag pa med pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin no/_/gzhan ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin zhes bya bar grub po/_/dge ba la sogs pa'i dri ba la/_dge ba brgyad/_
[\[111b.2\]]dad pa la sogs pa gcig tu dge ba rnams so/_/yid mi bde ba/_rnam gnyis/_dge ba yang yin/_mi dge ba yang ngo /_/yid dang tshor gzhan ni/_rnam gsum/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa dag go/_/gzhan ni rnam pa gcig_/brgyad po dag ni lung du ma bstan pa kho
[\[111b.3\]]na'o/_/khams kyi dri ba la/_dri med ma gtogs 'dod par gtogs/_/gcig tu zag pa med pa ma gtogs pa'i lhag ma ni srid pas 'dod par gtogs pa'o/_/pho mo'i dbang dang sdug bsngal dag_/ma gtogs gzugs gtogs/_dri ma med pa yang ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar te/_sdug
[\[111b.4\]]bsngal dag_/ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba dag go/_/gzugs can dang /_bde ba'ang ma gtogs gzugs med gtogs/_/ji skad bshad pa ma gtogs pa'i lhag ma ci zhe na/_yid dang /_srog dang /_btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang /_dad pa la sogs pa lnga po
[\[111b.5\]]yang ngo /_/spong ba'i dri ba la/_yid dang tshor ba gsum rnam gsum/_/tshor ba gsum ni bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_btang snyoms rnams so/_/gnyis kyis spang bya yid mi bde/_/yid mi bde ba ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa gnyis kyis spang bar bya ba yin no/_/dgu ni bsgom pas spang bar bya
[\[111b.6\]]zhes pa'i dbang du byas te/_mig la sogs pa dang brgyad pa srog dang sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag kho na yin no/_/lnga po ni spang bar bya ba yin yang /_dad pa la sogs pa lnga ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag
[\[111b.7\]]ma yin pa yang ngo /_/gsum min gzhan gsum ni spang bya ma yin pa nyid de/_zag pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa'i bye brag bshad zin nas rnyed pa brjod par bya ste/_'dod par dang po rnam smin gnyis/_/rnyed de/_lus kyi dbang po dang /_srog gi dbang po'o/_/de dag kyang /_rdzus te
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]skye bas min/_rdzus te skye ba bkag pas sgo nga las skye ba dang /_mngal nas skye ba dang /_drod gsher las skyes ba dag gis rnyed bar rig par bya'o/_/yid dang btang snyoms dag kyang nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa las byung
[\[112a.2\]]bdag ma yin no/_/yang rdzus te skye ba dag gis du zhig 'thob ce na/_de yis drug gam/_gal te mtshan ma med pa zhig yin na ste/_'di ltar bskal pa dang po pa rnams lta bu'o/_/de dag gis mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_srog gi dbang po rnams 'thob bo/_/bdun
[\[112a.3\]]nam ni/_gal te mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ste/_'di ltar lta la sogs pa dag na'o/_/brgyad ni gal te mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na'o/_/ji ltar ngan song dag na'o/_/re zhig 'dod pa'i khams na ni de lta bu yin no/_/gzugs na drug go/_/'dod pa'i khams na mtshan ma med pa dag
[\[112a.4\]]gis rnyed pa gang dag yin pa nyid do/_/gong mar gcig_/gzugs med pa'i khams su dang po nyid du srog gi dbang po gcig kho na rnam par smin pa thob bo/_/rnyed pa bshad zin nas gtong ba brjod pa/_gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni/_/srog dang yid dang btang snyoms nyid/_/'gag par 'gyur ro
[\[112a.5\]]gzugs na brgyad/_/gzugs kyi khams su 'chi ba na gsum po de dag dang /_mig la sogs pa lnga dang dbang po brgyad 'gag go/_/'dod par bcu'am dgu'am brgyad/_/mtshan gnyis pa'i ni brgyad po de dag dang pho dang mo'i dbang po dang bcu 'gag go/_/mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na dgu'o/_/mtshan med
[\[112a.6\]]pa zhig yin na brgyad do/_/rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi/_rim gyis 'chi na lus dang srog dang yid dang /_btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag 'gag go/_/nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni tshul de'o/_/dge ba'i sems kyis kyang /_dge la thams cad dag tu lnga/_/thams
[\[112a.7\]]cad du ji skad bshad pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhag par dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga ni dge ba'i sems kyis 'chi ba la rig bar bya'o/_/dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ste/_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gang zhig dbang po du dag gis 'thob ce na/_'bras bu
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob/_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dag ni dbang po dgus thob bo/_/de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dad pa la sogs pa dang /_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dang /_yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dgus 'thob
[\[112b.2\]]po/_/zag pa med pa gnyis kyang bral bas thob pa 'dren pa dang gnas par byed pa nyid kyi phyir rim pa bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa dang /_kun shes byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang /_yid kyi dbang po dang /_bde ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi
[\[112b.3\]]dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig dang /_dgus 'thob bo/_/gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus/_/de la re zhig gal te/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis thob la/_de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis thob na ni dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang /_btang snyoms dang /_
[\[112b.4\]]yid kyi dbang po dang dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob po/_/'on te 'jig rten las 'das pas ni kun shes pa'i dbang po brgyad pa yin no/_/ci ste phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste/_de gang dag kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa
[\[112b.5\]]kho na bzhin no/_/gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis thob la/_de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag gis thob na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bzhin du bdun dang brgyad kyis 'thob bo/_/ci ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste/_rgyun du
[\[112b.6\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin no/_/yang 'dir rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig yin no/_/'o na chos mngon pa las dbang po du zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob ce na/_smras pa/_bcu gcig gis
[\[112b.7\]]zhes bshad pa ji ltar dgu dag gis she na/_de ni dgu kho nas 'thob ste/_bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid/_/'ga' zhig srid phyir bshad pa yin/_/gang zag 'ga' zhig gis yongs su nyams shing yongs su nyams nas bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi dbang po
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa srid pa yod pas de'i phyir bcu gcig dag gis zhes gsungs so/_/dbang po gang zhig dang ldan na gdon mi za bar dbang po du dag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste/_de la/_btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni/_/yid dang ldan
[\[113a.2\]]la nges gsum ldan/_/de ni gdon mi za bar gsum kho na ste/_'di dag ni phan tshun med na mi ldan pa yin gyi lhag ma rnams dang ni ma nges te/_ldan pa yang yod/_mi ldan pa yang yod do/_/bde lus ldan la bzhi dag dang /_/gang bde ba dang lus dag dang ldan pa de ni dbang po bzhi ste/_de gsum
[\[113a.3\]]dang 'di dag gi gcig lhag pas so/_/mig sogs ldan pa lnga dang ldan/_/gang zhig mig gi dbang po ldan pa de ni gdon mi za bar btang snyoms dang /_srog dang /_yid dang /_lus kyi dbang po dag dang de dang dbang po lnga dang ldan te/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce'i dbang po dag dang ldan pa yang de dang 'dra bar rig
[\[113a.4\]]par bya'o/_/yid bde ldan yang /_gang zhig yid bde ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa de yang gdon mi za bar btang snyoms dang /_srog dang /_yid dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_dbang po lnga dang ldan no/_/sdug bsngal ldan/_bdun dang /_gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang ldan pa de ni gdon mi za bar lus dang /_
[\[113a.5\]]srog dang /_yid dag dang /_tshor ba'i dbang po bzhi dang bdun dang ldan no/_/mo'i dbang sogs ldan/_brgyad dang /_gang zhig mo'i dbang po dang ldan pa de ni gdon mi za bar bdun po de dag dang mo'i dang brgyad dang ldan no/_/sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras ni pho'i dbang po dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_dad pa
[\[113a.6\]]la sogs pa gzung ste/_de dag dang ldan pa ni re re zhing yang brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/_bdun po de dag dang /_pho'i dbang po dang ldan no/_/yid mi bde ba'i dbang po yang de dang 'dra'o/_/dad pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni lnga po de dag dang /_btang snyoms dang /_srog dang /_yid dang ldan no/_/kun shes
[\[113a.7\]]ldan pa yi/_/dbang po ldan la bcu gcig ldan/_/gang zhig kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa de ni gdon mi za bar bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_srog dang /_yid dang dad pa la sogs pa dag dang /_kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /_bcu gcig dang ldan no/_/de bzhin du kun
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa yang bcu po de dag nyid dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang ldan no/_/kun shes byed pa'i dbang ldan la/_/bcu gsum ngag dang ldan pa yin/_/yid dang /_srog dang /_lus kyi dbang po dag dang /_tshor ba'i dbang po bzhi dag dang /_dad pa la sogs pa
[\[113b.2\]]dang /_kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang ldan no/_/gang zhig nang na nyung ba dang ldan pa de dbang po ji snyed cig dang ldan zhe na/_dge med nang na nyung ldan pa/_/lus tshor srog yid brgyad dang ldan/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa ste/_de nang na nyung ba dag dang ldan na tshor ba lnga dag dang /_lus dang /_
[\[113b.3\]]yid dang /_srog dang /_dbang po brgyad dang ldan no/_/ji ltar dge ba med pa ltar/_/gzugs med byis pa'ang de bzhin te/_/btang snyoms srog yid dge rnams dang /_/so so'i skye bo btang snyoms dang /_/srog dang /_yid dang /_dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang ldan no/_/yang gang zhig nang na
[\[113b.4\]]dbang po mang po dang ldan pa de ji snyed cig dang ldan zhe na/_mang por ldan na bcu dgu ste/_/dri ma med rnams ma gtogs so/_/mtshan gnyis/_zag pa med pa gsum ma gtogs pa mtshan gnyis pa ni bcu dgu dang ldan no/_/gzhan yang gang zhig ce na/_'phags pa chags bcas te/_
[\[113b.5\]]mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs/_/slob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba mtshan gcig pa kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang gnyis po las gang yang rung ba gcig dang ldan pa ma gtogs pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa'o/_/dbang po rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rgyas par bshad zin nas/_'di
[\[113b.6\]]dpyad par bya ste/_kyi 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag ji ltar mtshan nyid tha dad pa de bzhin du tha dad par skye ba zhig yin nam/_'on te kha cig nges par lhan cig skye ba yang yod ce na/_smras pa/_yod de/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs dang /_sems dang sems las byung ba dag dang /_
[\[113b.7\]]sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang lngar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba med pa nyid do/_/chos gzugs can rnams kyi nges pa ni 'di yin te/_'dod na dbang po med pa dang /_sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad/_/thams cad las phra ba'i gzugs ni bsags
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]pa'i rdul phra rab ces bya ste/_de 'dod pa'i khams na sgra yang med dbang po yang med pa zhig yin na ni rdzas brgyad dang ldan par skye ste/_'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /_gzugs dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya rnams so/_/lus dbang ldan la rdzas dgu'o/_/gang rdzas brgyad dang /_lus
[\[114a.2\]]kyi dbang po yod pa de ni de nyid dang dgu'o/_/dbang po gzhan ldan rdzas bcu'o/_/gang la mig la sogs pa gang yang rung ba zhig yod pa de kho na dang bcu pa'o/_/de dag sgra dang bcas pa zhig tu skye na yang rdzas dgu dang /_bcu dang /_bcu gcig dang ldan no/_/rdzas kyi sgra yang 'dir 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi don
[\[114a.3\]]to/_/de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa so sor 'byung ba bzhi la brten par 'dod do/_/gzugs la sogs pa rdzas kyi sgra ni skye mched kyi don can no/_/de lta na yang dbyibs la sogs par grub bo/_/gzugs can rnams kyi nges par lhan cig 'byung ba bshad zin nas lhag ma rnams kyi brjod par bya ste/_sems
[\[114a.4\]]dang sems byung nges lhan cig_/thams cad 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang /_/thob pa'am/_thob pa dang ni sems can du ston pa kho na dang lhan cig skye'i gzhan dang ni ma yin no zhes bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra smos so/_/sems las byung ba rnams zhes brjod pa sems las byung ba de dag gang zhe na/_
[\[114a.5\]]sems byung rnam lnga ste/_sa mang la sogs tha dad phyir/_/'di lta ste/_sa mang po dag dang /_dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa pa rnams so/_/tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang /_/
[\[114a.6\]]'dun dang reg dang blo gros dran/_/yid la byed dang mos pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin sems thams cad la/_/de la tshor ba ni bshad zin to/_/sems pa ni sems mngon par 'du byed pa'o/_/'du shes ni brjod zin to/_/'dun pa ni byed 'dod pa'o/_/reg pa ni yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes
[\[114a.7\]]pa 'dun pa las skyes pa'i reg pa'o/_/blo gros ni shes rab ste/_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/dran pa ni dmigs pa ma brjed pa'o/_/yid la byed pa ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o/_/mos pa ni 'dod pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/_/'di dag ni sa thams cad la 'byung ngo /_/dad dang
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]bag yod shin tu sbyangs/_/btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod/_/rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang /_/brtson 'grus rtag tu dge la 'byung /_/de la dad pa ni sems dang ba'o/_/bag yod pa ni dge ba'i chos rnams bsgom pa ste/_de dag la gces su 'dzin pas kun du srung ba zhes bya ba'i don to/_/_
[\[114b.2\]]shin tu sbyangs pa ni sems las su rung ba nyid do/_/btang snyoms ni sems mnyam pa nyid dang sems lhun gyis grub pa nyid do/_/ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba gnyis ni chags pa med pa dang /_zhe sdang med pa dag go/_/gti mug med pa yang yod mod kyi
[\[114b.3\]]de yang shes rab ste/_sa mang po par bshad do/_/rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni rnam par tho mi 'tshams pa'o/_/brtson 'grus ni dge ba la sems mngon par spro ba'o/_/'di dag ni dge ba'i sems thams cad la 'byung ba'o/_/rmongs dang bag med le lo dang /_/ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod/_/nyon
[\[114b.4\]]mongs can la rtag tu 'byung /_/de la rmongs pa ni mi shes pa dang mi gsal ba'o/_/bag med pa ni bag yod ba'i mi mthun pa'o/_/le lo ni brtson 'grus kyi mi mthun ba'i phyogs so/_/ma dad pa ni dad pa'i mi mthun pa'o/_/rmugs pa ni sems las su mi rung ba'o/_/rgod pa ni sems rnam
[\[114b.5\]]par ma zhi ba ste/_'di dag ni nyon mongs pa can gyi sems thams cad la 'byung ngo /_/mi dge la ni khrel med dang /_/ngo tsha med pa'o/_/de dag gi mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad do/_/khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin dang g.yo dang ni/_/phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang /_/sgyu dang rgyags
[\[114b.6\]]dang rnam 'tshe ni/_/nyon mongs chung ngu'i sa pa rnams/_'di dag ni ma rig pa tsam dang /_bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang /_yid kyi sa pa kho na dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa par brjod do/_/'di dag gi rgyas par bshad pa ni phyis 'chad do/_/sems gang zhig
[\[114b.7\]]la sems las byung ba du zhig gdon mi za bar 'byung ba brjod par bya ste/_re zhig 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems ni rnam pa lnga ste dge ba la sogs pa'o/_/de la/_'dod pa'i dge ba'i sems la ni/_/rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir/_/sems las byung ba nyi shu gnyis/_/sa mang po pa
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]bcu dang /_dge ba'i mang po pa bcu dang /_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dag go/_/la la dag tu 'gyod pa bsnan/_/de la gang dge ba ma byas pa dang /_mi dge ba byas nas gdung ba gang yin pa ste/_de ni mi dge ba byas pa la dmigs pa'i yid la gcags pa dge ba
[\[115a.2\]]la 'gyod pa'o/_/de ni gang la yod pa de la sems las byung ba nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung ngo /_/mi dge la ni ma 'dres dang /_/lta dang ldan pa'ang nyi shu 'byung /_/ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni sems gang lam rig pa 'ba' zhig pa ste/_de la sa mang po pa bcu dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa drug dang /_mi dge
[\[115a.3\]]ba'i sa mang po pa gnyis dang /_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa'o/_/mi dge ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa yang nyi shu 'byung ste/_gang kho na ma 'dres pa la'o/_/lta ba yang mi dge ba 'jig tshogs dang /_mthar 'dzin pa ma gtogs pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin pas bsnan pa ma yin no/_/nyon mongs bzhi dang khro
[\[115a.4\]]sogs dang /_/'gyod pa dang ni nyi shu gcig_/de la nyon mongs pa bzhi ni 'dod chags dang /_khong khro dang /_nga rgyal dang /_the tshom mo/_/khro ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to/_/'gyod pa ni mi dge ba ste dge ba las bzlog pas so/_/'di dag gang la yod pa de ni nyi shu rtsa gcig yin te/_'di dag kho
[\[115a.5\]]na las gang yang rung ba cig lhag par byas nas so/_/bsgribs la bco brgyad/_'dod pa'i khams na 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni bsgribs pa ste/_de la sems las byung ba bco brgyad 'byung ste/_sa mang po pa bcu dang /_nyon mongs pa'i
[\[115a.6\]]sa mang po pa drug dang /_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa'o/_/lung ma bstan/_gzhag la bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod/_/ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems la sa mang po pa bcu dang /_rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa zhes bya ba bcu gnyis so/_/gnyid ni kun la mi 'gal phyir/_/gang la yod pa des bsnan
[\[115a.7\]]to/_/gnyid ni ji skad bshad pa thams cad dang mi 'gal te/_de'i phyir gang la yod pa de la des bsnan par rig par bya'o/_/gang de ltar 'dod pa'i khams la sems byung nges par bshad pa/_de las 'gyod gnyid mi dge rnams/_/bsam gtan dang po dag na med/_/bsam gtan dang po na ni
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]ji skad bshad pa de las 'gyod pa dang /_gnyid dang /_gang yang cung zad mi dge ba g.yob la sogs pa thams cad du med de/_gzhan thams cad ni de dang 'dra'o/_/bsam gtan dang po na med pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na dang /_rtog pa'ang bsam gtan khyad par can/_/de'i gang na dpyod
[\[115b.2\]]pa yang med de lhag ma ni de dang 'dra'o/_/da ni gzhung las byung ba kha cig gi tha dad du bya ba 'byung ba brjod par bya ste/_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na/_ma gus ngo tsha med/_yon tan rnams dang yon tan can rnams la ma gus pa nyid ni bkur pa med pa nyid
[\[115b.3\]]de ngo tsha med pa'o/_/khrel med/_kha na ma tho 'jigs mi lta/_/kha na ma tho ba zhes bya ba ni dam pa rnams kyis smad pa ste/_de la 'jig par mi lta ba ni khrel med pa'o/_/'dir 'jigs pa ni mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ste/_'di las 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/bzlog pa ni ngo tsha shes
[\[115b.4\]]pa dang khrel yod pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/dga' ba dang gus pa la tha dang du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na/_dga' dang /_dga' ba ni rnam pa gnyis dang /_/nyon mongs pa can ni sred pa ste/_dper na bu dang chung ma la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni dad pa ste/_dper na
[\[115b.5\]]ston pa dang bla ma dang yon tan can rnams la bya ba bzhin no/_/gus nyid ngo tsha shes/_gus pa ni ngo tsha shes pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin no/_/de gnyis 'dod dang gzugs dag na/_/gzugs med pa yi khams na ni/_/gang zag la dmigs pa'i dga' ba dang gus pa dag med do/_/
[\[115b.6\]]rnam par rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dag la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na/_rtog dang dpyod pa rtsing zhib nyid/_/sems kyi'o zhes 'og nas 'chad de/_rtog pa ni sems rtsing ba'o/_/dpyod pa ni sems zhib pa'o/_/nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dag la tha dad du bya ba ci zhig yod ce na/_nga
[\[115b.7\]]rgyal khengs pa rgyags pa ni/_/rang gi chos la chags pa yi/_/sems ni yongs su gtugs pa'o/_/pha rol po las gang yang rung ba'i khyad par zhig yongs su btags nas sems khengs pa ni nga rgyal lo/_/rgyags pa ni rang gi chos kho na la chags pa'i sems yongs su gtugs pa
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]gang yin pa'o/_/sems las byung ba rnams sems dang bcas te bshad zin to/_/gsung rab las 'di dag gi tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i phyir de dag gi ming 'di dag brjod de/_sems dang yid dang rnam shes ni/_/don gcig 'byed pas na sems so/_/go bas na yid
[\[116a.2\]]do/_/rnam par shes pas na rnam par shes pa'o/_/sems dang sems byung dang /_rten dang dmigs dang rnam bcas dang /_/mtshungs par ldan pa'ang don gcig ste/_/sems dang sems las byung ba de dag nyid dbang po la brten pa'i phyir rten dang bcas pa dag ces bya'o/_/yul la 'dzin pa'i phyir
[\[116a.3\]]dmigs pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/dmigs pa de nyid la sems rnam pa re re nas bye brag tu gcod pa'i phyir rnam pa dang bcas pa dag go/_/mnyam par ldan pa'i phyir mtshungs par ldan pa dag go/_/rnam pa gang dag gis mtshungs par ldan zhe na/_gsungs pa/_rnam pa lnga/_mtshungs pa rnam pa
[\[116a.4\]]lnga po rten dang /_dmigs pa dang /_rnam pa dang /_dus dang /_rdzas mtshungs pa dag gis mtshungs par ldan no/_/rdzas mtshungs pa yang ji ltar sems gcig kho na yin pa de kho na bzhin du sems las byung ba rnams kyang re re yin pa'o/_/sems dang sems las byung ba dag bshad zin to/_/mi ldan pa yi
[\[116a.5\]]'du byed rnams/_/thob dang ma thob skal mnyam dang /_/'du shes med snyoms 'jug dag dang /_/srog dang mtshan nyid rnams dang ni/_/ming gi tshogs la sogs pa yang /_/'du byed 'di dag ni sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin la/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin yang ma yin pas
[\[116a.6\]]sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag ces bya'o/_/de la re zhig_/thob pa rnyed dang ldan pa'o/_/thob pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_ma thob pa dang /_rnam par nyams pa las rnyed pa dang /_thob nas ldan pa'o/_/bzlog pa ni ma thob pa'o zhes bya bar grub po/_/'di dag kyang gang gi yin zhe na/_thob dang ma thob
[\[116a.7\]]rang rgyud du/_/gtogs pa rnams kyi'o/_/gzhan gyi rgyud du gtogs pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te/_gzhan dag dang ni 'ga' yang ldan pa med do/_/rgyud du ma gtogs pa rnams kyi ni yang ma yin te/_sems can du mi bgrang bdag ni 'ga' yang ldan pa med do/_/slar yang thob pa dang ma
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]thob pa dag ni/_'gog gnyis kyi/_so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa ni sems can thams cad dang ldan no/_/so sor brtags pa dang ni 'ga' zhig go/_/thob pa de yang ni/_dus gsum pa yi rnam pa gsum/_/chos 'das pa rnams kyi thob pa 'das pa yang yod/_ma 'ongs
[\[116b.2\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba yang yod la/_de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yang so sor rnam pa gsum mo/_/dge la sogs kyi dge la sogs/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rim pa bzhin du dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_
[\[116b.3\]]lung du ma bstan pa de kho na yin no/_/der gtogs rnams kyi rang khams pa/_/'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rang gi khams pa kho na'o/_/ma gtogs rnams kyi rnam pa bzhi/_/zag pa med pa rnams kyi thob pa ni rnam pa bzhi
[\[116b.4\]]ste/_so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i ni gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa'ang yin la/_zag pa med pa'ang yin te/_lam gyi dbang gis so/_/lam gyi bden pa'i ni zag pa med pa nyid do/_/so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa'i ni khams gsum pa
[\[116b.5\]]ma yin te skye ba'i dbang gis so/_/de ni bsdus nas rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/slob pa rnams kyi thob pa ni thob pa'i slob pa kho na yin no/_/mi slob pa rnams kyi thob pa ni mi slob pa nyid do/_/slob dang mi slob min gyi gsum/_/de dag kyang zag pa dang bcas pa dang 'dus ma
[\[116b.6\]]byas pa'o/_/de la zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa'i dang /_'phags pa ma yin pas thob pa so sor brtags pas 'gog pa'i thob pa ni slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin no/_/de nyid kyi slob pas thob pa ni slob pa'o/_/mi slob
[\[116b.7\]]pas thob ba ni mi slob pa'o/_/mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi thob pa ni de'i rigs dag kho nas so/_/spang bya min pa'i rnam gnyis 'dod/_/zag pa med pa rnams la so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pas thob ba so sor brtags pas
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]'gog pa'i thob pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'o/_/de nyid 'phags pa'i lam gyis thob pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa'i ni zag pa med pa ste/_spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/dus gsum pa yi rnam pa gsum/_/zhes spyir bstan pa gang yin pa de'i dmigs
[\[117a.2\]]kyis gsal ba ni 'di yin te/_lung bstan min thob lhan cig skyes/_/ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi thob pa ni lhan cig skyes pa kho na'o/_/mngon shes sprul pa ma gtogs pa/_/mngon par shes pa dang lung du ma bstan pa gnyis dang sprul pa'i sems ma gtogs pa'o/_/
[\[117a.3\]]de dag ni sbyor ba'i khyad par gyis 'grub pas stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir sngar dang phyis dang lhan cig skyes pa yang yod do/_/ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na'i thob pa dang lhan cig skyes pa yin nam zhe na/_smras pa bsgribs pa'i gzugs kyi thob pa ni lhan cig skyes pa kho na'o/_/
[\[117a.4\]]chen pos kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa mi slong bas stobs chung bar grub pa'i phyir ro/_/dus gsum pa yi rnam pa gsum/_/zhes bya ba'i dmigs bsal ni/_'dod pa na/_gzugs kyi sngar ni skye ba med/_/lhan cig skye ba dang /_dus phyis skye ba ni yod do/_/
[\[117a.5\]]thob pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag ni bshad zin to/_/ma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan/_/ma thob pa thams cad ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no/_/'das ma skyes kyi de rnam gsum/_/da ltar byung ba ma thob pa ni med de/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dag ni dus
[\[117a.6\]]gsum pa yin no/_/'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyi'ang /_/rnam pa gsum zhes bya bar sbyar te/_'dod par gtogs pa rnams kyi ni 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i yin te/_rigs pa'i dbang gis so/_/gzugs dang /_
[\[117a.7\]]gzugs med par gtogs pa rnams dang /_zag pa rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o/_/ma thob pa zag pa med pa ni med de/_'di ltar/_lam ma thob pa so so yi/_/skye bor 'dod do/_/gang gi phyir so so'i skye bo nyid ni zag pa med pa yin par mi 'os so/_/yang ma thob pa ni ji
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]ltar nyams she na/_chos gang gi ma thob pa gang yin pa de ni/_de thob pa dang /_sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur/_/re zhig 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i lam gyi ma rnyed pa ni so so'i skye bo nyid de/_de ni rnyed pa dang /_sa 'phos pa las rnam par nyams par 'gyur te/_gzhan dag
[\[117b.2\]]gi yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/yang skal ba mnyam pa 'di ci zhe na/_skal mnyam sems can 'dra ba'o/_/skal ba mnyam pa nyid ni sems can rnams kyi 'dra ba yin te/_de yang tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_tha dad pa ste/_de dag kho na'i sa dang /_khams dang /_'gro ba dang /_skye
[\[117b.3\]]gnas la sogs pa'i dbye bas so/_/yang 'du shes med ba pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na/_'du shes med pa pa 'du shes/_/med par sems dang sems byung rnams/_/'gog pa'o/_/gang gis ma 'ongs pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa de ni 'du shes med pa pa zhes
[\[117b.4\]]bya ba'i rdzas so/_/de yang gcig tu rnam smin/_'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i'o/_/gang dag na 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams 'khod pa'i sems can de dag gang zhe na/_de 'bras che/_lha de dag ni 'bras bu che ba zhes bya ba yin te/_de dag gi phyogs gcig ni 'du shes med
[\[117b.5\]]pa pa yin te/_bsam gtan khyad par can bzhin no/_/'du shes med pa pa bshad zin to/_/ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa la 'du shes med par bshad pa/_de bzhin 'du shes med snyoms 'jug_/sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi 'gog pa zhes bya ba tsam ste/_de
[\[117b.6\]]bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras 'dren to/_/snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/_bsam gtan tha mar/_'di bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa yin no/_/de la yang snyoms par 'jug pa ni/_'byung 'dod pas/_'di la nges par 'byung 'dod cing snyoms par 'jug go/_/'du shes med pa pa ni rnam par smin
[\[117b.7\]]pa yin pa'i phyir lung ma bstan pa zhes bya bar grub bo/_/'di ni dge ba'o/_/dge ba yin yang /_skyes nas myong gyur nyid/_mthong ba'i chos dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin la/_ma nges pa yang ma yin no/_/de yang so so'i skye bo kho na'i yin par 'dod kyi/_'phags
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]pa'i ma yin/_'phags pa rnams ni 'di la ltung ba'i gnas lta bur gzigs pas snyoms par mi 'jug go/_/'di ni sems med pa yin yang mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir/_dus gcig thob/_da ltar gyi dus kho na thob po/_/skad
[\[118a.2\]]cig ma gnyis pa la sogs par ni ji srid du thob pa 'das pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ji lta bar/_'gog pa zhes pa'ang de bzhin nyid/_/sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa'o zhes bya ba tsam dang 'brel bar bya'o/_/khyad par du/_
[\[118a.3\]]'di gnas don du/_zhi bar gnas pa'i 'du shes mngon du btang ba'i yid la byed pas 'di la snyoms par 'jug go/_/yang de ni bsam gtan bzhi ba'i sa pa yin gyi/_'di ni srid rtser skyes/_'di ni dge ba'o/_/dge ba kho na yin gyi nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin la lung du ma
[\[118a.4\]]bstan pa yang ma yin no/_/dge ba yin yang /_gnyis su myong 'gyur dang /_ma nges/_skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_lan grangs gzhan las myang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dus gnyis su 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par smin pa'i phyir ma nges pa yang ma yin no/_/de yang mtha' gcig tu
[\[118a.5\]]'phags pa'i/_'phags pa'i yang 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral bas thob par bya ba ma yin te/_'on kyang sbyor bas 'thob/_'di ni sbyor bas thob par bya ba kho na yin pas 'das pa yang mi thob la ma 'ongs pa yang mi thob ste/_de ni sems kyi stobs kyis thob pa'i phyir ro/_/ci bcom ldan
[\[118a.6\]]'das kyi yang sbyor ba las byung ba yin na ma zhe na/_smras pa ma yin no/_/'on kyang /_thub pa'i byang chub kyis thob bya/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni 'di zad pa mkhyen pa dang /_dus mnyam du brnyes so/_/nub phyogs pa dag na re de ni dang po kho nar byang chub sems
[\[118a.7\]]dpa' slob pa'i gnas skabs na skyed par byed do zhes zer ro/_/kha che ba rnams na re/_dang por ma yin/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_skad cig ma/_sum cu rtsa bzhis thob phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni sems kyi skad cig ma sum cu rtsa bzhis byang chub rjes su thob ste/_bden pa mngon par
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]rtogs pa na bcu drug dang /_srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'dod chags dang bral ba na nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa dgu spong bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu dgu skye ba'i phyir bco brgyad de/_de'i phyir bar skabs 'dir mi 'dra ba'i sems mi srid pas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi
[\[118b.2\]]rung ngo /_/snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyis kyi rnam pa'i bye brag mang po zhig yod mod kyi/_gnyis ka 'dod dang gzugs rten can/_/snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyis ka yang 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su bskyed do/_/yang /_'gog pa dang por mi'i nang du/_'gog pa'i snyoms
[\[118b.3\]]par 'jug pa ni dang por mi dag gi nang du skyed do/_/phyis ni sngar yongs su nyams pa de dag gis gzugs kyi khams su yang skyed do/_/snyoms par 'jug pa dag bshad zin to/_/srog ni tshe yin/_tshe zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin pa de yang mi shes pas/_drod dang ni/_rnam shes rten
[\[118b.4\]]gang yin pa'o/_/gang drod dang rnam par shes pa'i rten du gyur pa'i chos gnas pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni tshe yin no/_/srog bshad zin to/_/mtshan nyid dag ni skye ba dang /_/rga dang gnas dang mi rtag nyid/_/bzhi po 'di rnams ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dag yin te/_gang la 'di
[\[118b.5\]]dag yod pa'i chos de ni 'dus byas su mngon no/_/bzlog pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/skye ba la sogs pa de dag kyang 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir skye ba la sogs pa gzhan yod par 'gyur ro zhe na/_yod pa de kho na ste/_de dag skye ba'i skye la sogs/_/de dag la yang skye ba'i skye ba dang /_rga
[\[118b.6\]]ba'i rga ba dang /_gnas pa'i gnas pa dang /_mi rtag pa nyid kyi mi rtag pa nyid do zhes bya ba rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi yod do/_/re re la yang mtshan nyid bzhi pa dang /_mthar thug pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na/_mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar/_de chos brgyad dang gcig la 'jug_/chos
[\[118b.7\]]bdag nyid gtogs par mtshan nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid brgyad dang lhan cig tu dgu skye la/_de la skye bas ni bdag nyid ma gtogs pa chos gzhan brgyad skyed par byed do/_/skye ba'i skye bas ni de kho na skyed par byed do/_/de bzhin du gnas pa la sogs pas gnas pa dang /_skyed
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]pa dang nyams par byed pa zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba bskyed par bya ba skyed pa yin na/_ma 'ongs pa thams cad cig car ci'i phyir mi skyed ce na/_'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni/_skye ba bskyed bya skyed byed min/_/rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa
[\[119a.2\]]med par ni skye ba skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/mtshan nyid dag ni bshad zin to/_/ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni/_/ming dang ngag dang yi ge'i tshogs/_/sogs pa smos pa ni tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs gzung ngo /_/de la ming byed pas ni ming ste/_dper na gzugs sgra zhes bya ba la sogs
[\[119a.3\]]pa lta bu'o/_/ngag ni tshig ste ji tsam gyis don yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/yi ge ni yi ge ste/_ming la sogs pa de dag gi tshogs ni ming la sogs pa'i tshogs dag yin te/_mang ba'i don gang yin pa'o/_/yang ci ming gi tshogs la sogs pa 'di dag ldan pa'am/_sems can du ston pa'am/_
[\[119a.4\]]sems can ma yin par ston pa'am/_rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'am/_rgyas pa las byung ba'am/_rgyu mthun pa las byung ba 'am/_dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_lung du ma bstan pa gcig ces brjod par bya zhe na/_smras pa/_'dod dang gzugs gtogs sems can ston/_/
[\[119a.5\]]rgyu mthun lung bstan min/_'dod par gtogs pa dang /_gzugs su gtogs pa 'di dag ni ston pa'o/_/gang zhig rjod par byed pa de dag dang ldan gyi brjod par bya ba gang yin pa dang ni ma yin no/_/rgyu mthun pa las byung ba dang /_ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag yin no/_/
